column2: Show of force
Keep the fleet in our territorial waters
column9: Оставить флот в наших территориальных водах

column2: Send the Grand Fleet towards Ireland
Divide the fleet and perform manouvers near the Azores and Iceland
column9: Разделить флот и совершать маневры около Азорских островов и Исландии

column2: Union of Britain threatens Ireland

The British navy has steamed out of its ports and has assembled to demonstrate its power against our neutral island. In face of this grave situation, many politicians suggest that Ireland should find someone to guarantee its independence. The most reasonable option would be Germany - but there are even some advocating a return under Windsor protection.
Maintain our neutrality
Ask the Kaiser for protection
Ask the Canadian king for protection
The Irish cower before us
Our fleet has clearly scared the Irish. Their response was limited to feeble diplomatic protest, with no major power backing them. This is a clear success for our state!
column9: Наш флот испугал ирландцев. Их реакция ограничилась слабым протестом, без поддержки какой-либо великой державы. Это - несомненный успех нашего государства!

column2: Job well done!
Ireland asks for help

The Irish have asked for our support in face of British violation of their neutrality. This gives us an opportunity to recover a part of our sphere of influence and undermine the socialist activities in the region.
column9: Ирландцы просят нашей поддержки перед лицом нарушения их нейтралитета Британией. Это дает нам возможность возвратить часть нашей сферы влияния и подорвать действия социалистов в регионе.

column2: Proclalim that Ireland is protected by the Entente
column9: Объявить, что Ирландия под защитой Антанты

column2: Annouce our support for Ireland
We are not ready for such involvement in the Old World
column9: Мы не готовы к таким действиям в Старом Свете

column2: Canada announces that they'll protect us

The Canadian government has proposed to offer military and diplomatic support against the Union. Even though there are still many circles fearing the potential rise of Windsor influence, this is clearly a step towards our security.
column9: Канадское правительство предложило нам военную и дипломатическую поддержку против Союза. Несмотря на то, что многие боятся усиления влияния Виндзоров, это - правильный шаг в деле обеспечения нашей безопасности.

column2: Most splendid!
It is not a good idea.....
The Irish are protected by the Entente

It seems that we have unwillingly pushed Ireland towards the Canadian sphere of influence. Their newly signed pact will surely hamper our efforts towards the reunification of both British islands and serve the imperialists' purposes.
column9: Кажется, что мы, сами того не желая, толкнули Ирландию в канадскую сферу влияния. Недавно подписанный договор будет, конечно, препятствовать нашим усилиям к воссоединению обоих Британских островов и служить империалистическим целям.

column2: Bloody hell!
Canada annouces support

The Canadian government has offered full diplomatic support against the Union of Britain. While it is an important political gesture, it has little true value, as the Canadaians are rather unlikely to directly intervene in any potential conflict.
column9: Канадское правительство предложило полную дипломатическую поддержку против Британского Союза. Важный жест, но суть его в том, что канадцы вряд ли непосредственно вмешаются в любой потенциальный конфликт.

column2: At least we're not alone...
column9: По крайней мере, мы не остались одни...

column2: The Canadians interfere

The Canadian government has backed the Irish diplomatically. Even though this gesture has little military value, we should consider easing our policy towards Ireland, until the diplomatic climate changes.
column9: Канадское правительство поддержало ирландцев дипломатически. Несмотря на то, что военная ценность этого жеста ничтожна, мы должны пересмотреть нашу политику по отношению к Ирландии, для улучшения дипломатического климата.

column2: It may actually be quite wise to do so...
The Canadians let us down
The Canadian government has ignored our call for help. Whatever comes next, we must be prepared for the worst.
column9: Канадское правительство проигнорировало нашу просьбу о помощи. Независимо от того, что последует далее, мы должны подготовиться к худшему.

column2: Oh no!
The Canadians cower
The Irish call for help remained unanswered. This gives us a free hand in choosing our next step towards the Emerald Isle.
column9: Ирландская просьба о помощи осталась без ответа. Это дает нам свободу действия в выборе нашего следующего шага к овладению Изумрудным островом.

column2: The reborn socialist navy has left its naval base in Liverpool and is heading towards Iceland and the Azores. Although both diplomatic and intelligence sources report this move is just a show of force, it should not be ignored. The kaiser believes that in such circumstances, the Hochseeflotte should organise her own manouvers to show its readiness to defend Mitteleuropa. However, the cost of such an operation is likely to be criticised by many people, as the depression consumes more and more funds.
Our reputation is more important - send the Hochseeflotte
column9: Наша репутация чрезвычайно важна - отправить Хохзеефлотте

column2: Flexing muscules comes after the economy
The Hochseeflotte on the North Sea

The kaiser has ordered the High Seas Fleet to enter the North Sea in a show of force outclassing ours. Although Germany is too weak for another war, we should keep this act in mind, should we attempt another demonstration against Mitteleuropa's hegemony.
column9: Кайзер приказал, чтобы Хохзеефлотте вошел в Северное море для демонстрации силы, превосходящей нашу. Хотя Германия слишком слаба для новой войны, мы должны не забывать об этом, чтобы впредь бросить вызов гегемонии Срединной Европы.

column2: Bloody hell!
The Hochseeflotte on the North Sea

The kaiser has ordered the High Seas Fleet to enter the North Sea in a show of force outclassing the British one. Although Germany is too weak for another war, we should keep this act in mind, should we attempt another demonstration against Mitteleuropa's hegemony.
Merde!
The Germans cower
German economists and pacifists have persuaded the kaiser to keep the Hochseeflotte in port. This has shown the power of socialism and weakness of the Imperialist 'great powers'.
column9: Немецкие экономисты и пацифисты убедили кайзера оставить Хохзеефлотте в порту. Это доказало мощь социализма и слабость империалистической 'великой державы'.

column2: The socialist navy has left its naval base in Liverpool and is heading towards Iceland and the Azores. Although this move seems to be just a show of force, it should not be ignored. This is not a direct threat towards the Entente but many officials believe that leaving it unattendend is not a wise choice. A most appropriate answer would be to send out the Royal Navy, but this is opposed by many Canadians, who prefer further preparations before decisive action against the Union is taken.
Demonstrate our own power
Spend our resources on further buildup
column9: Потратить ресурсы на дальнейнее наращивание нашего потенциала

column2: The Royal Navy on the Atlantic

The king has ordered the Royal Navy to enter the Atlantic in a show of force fairly matching ours. Although the Entente is far too weak for another war, we should keep this act in mind, should we attempt another demonstration against the Entente.
column9: Король приказал, чтобы Королевский флот вошел в Атлантику для демонстрации силы. Хотя Антанта слишком слаба для новой войны, мы не должны забывать об этом, чтобы впредь бросить вызов альянсу.

column2: Bloody hell!
The Royal Navy on the Atlantic

Merde!
The Canadians cower
The Canadians have not dared to send their fleet into the Atlantic, allowing our force to operate freely. This has shown the power of socialism and weakness of the Imperialist 'great powers'.
column9: Канадцы не осмелились послать свой флот в Атлантику, позволив нашим силам действовать свободно. Это доказало мощь социализма и слабость империалистической 'великой державы'.

column2: Vive le socialisme!
The Brits invade Ireland

Armed forces of the Union of Britain have launched an invasion of Ireland. According to the treaty we have signed with Ireland before, we are obliged to aid Ireland in their struggle. Shall we warn the British about the foolishness of their actions?
column9: Вооруженные силы Британского Союза начали вторжение в Ирландию. По нашему с ней соглашению мы должны оказать помощь. Отправить Британии ноту о недопустимости ее действий?

column2: Warn them to turn back or face German arms!

The Second Reich has Sent an Ultimatum to London. We are to either pull out of Ireland and declare a cease fire or Germany will come to Ireland's aid.

column2: We will not risk war with Germany, Back to the Boats!
column9: Мы не станем рисковать войной с Германией!

column2: We Answer to no Monarchy! Continue onto Dublin!
The Ultimatum, Berlin Warns London
Germany has come to our aid! They have sent an ultimatum to the Union of Britain, either fall back to their home islands or risk annihilation.
column9: Германия пришла к нам на помощь! Британскому Союзу был предъявлен ультиматум, либо отвести войска, либо готовится к войне.

column2: We Knew They'd Pull Through For Us!
column9: Мы знали, что Германия вступится за нас!

column2: The Union of Britain Backs Down

After the ultimatum was received by London, they quickly sent orders to all their commanders on the ground to cease fire and return to the coast. We have achieved a diplomatic victory today, we have shown the world we will stand up to Socialist and Syndicalist aggression, and we will protect any nation under threat be it from Britain or France.
Diplomacy Has Achieved Peace Once Again!
The Brits Ignore our Ultimatum

After the ultimatum was received by London, they ignored it and are making their way to the Irish Capital of Dublin, clearly ignoring our ultimatum. We can either go through and declare war, bringing Ireland into our alliance or we can stand down and let Ireland fall.
They have made their choice, war it is!
column9: Они сделали свой выбор, это война!

column2: Back Down! We've changed our minds!
The British Pull out of Ireland

After the ultimatum was received by London, they quickly sent orders to all their commanders on the ground to cease fire and return to the coast. Ireland's independence will be kept, and our pride is intact.

column2: We couldn't have done it without Germany!

column2: Status of Ireland

Independent state of Ireland has been a threat to security of British Union for too long. With new war conflict in Europe looming on horizont, we must quickly solve this problem. But at first we must choose our overarching goal in regard to the Ireland...
Ireland must be directly ruled from London !
Ireland must become a socialist republic !
Military access and friendship treaty will be sufficient !
We don't care about Ireland
Dealing with Ireland
With our decision to bring the entire Ireland under direct control of London, we must now decided upon best approach, how to achieve our goal....
War will solve this !
Threaten them with war !
Actually, the entire dealing with Ireland was a mistake...
British ultimatum

The increasingly powerful Union of Britain has once again set its sight on our island. Union of Britain has issued a series of demands towards our state which, if accepted, will result in our incorporation into Union of Britain. Efforts to resist the powerful British armed forces without international backing seem futile.....
Accept their terms.
Never!
Irish submission
Seeing no other options the Irish leadership was forced to accept our demands. Irish state, once considered a potential threat to security of the Union of Britain exist no more !
Hooray!
Irish resistance
The foolish leadership of Ireland has rejected our rightful demands. How shall we react to this insolence?
War will solve this!
Back down.
Dealing with Ireland
With our decision to bring the entire Ireland under direct control of London, we must now decided upon best approach, how to achieve our goal....
War will solve this !

Covert operations will be good enough.
Actually, the entire dealing with Ireland was a mistake...
British ultimatum

The increasingly powerful Union of Britain has once again set its sight on our island. Union of Britain has issued a series of demands towards our state which, if accepted, will result in us becoming vassal state pf the Union of Britain. Efforts to resist the powerful British armed forces without military backing seem futile.....
Accept their terms.
Ask Canada for protection
Ask German Empire for protection
Never!
Irish submission
Seeing no other options the Irish leadership was forced to accept our demands. Irish state, once considered a potential threat to security of the Union of Britain is now our loyal ally !
Hooray!
Irish resistance
The foolish leadership of Ireland has rejected our rightful demands. How shall we react to this insolence?
War will solve this!
Back down.
Ireland begs for our protection

Government of Portugal has annouced recently that they want to join the Entente. It's not a sudden move because pro-Entente policy is popular in many circles including the ruling cabinet and army. Do we want to allow Portugal to join our alliance?
We shall protect Ireland !
Rather not
The Irish are protected by the Entente

It seems that we have unwillingly pushed Ireland towards the Canadian sphere of influence. Their newly signed pact will surely hamper our efforts towards the reunification of both British islands and serve the imperialists' purposes. How shall we react ?
It is too early to confront imperialists..
War will solve this !
The Canadians refuses to protect us
The Canadian government has ignored our call for help, leaving us to deal with powerfull armed forces of the Union of Britain alone...
Accept British demands...
We shall protect our freedom !
Ireland begs for our protection

We shall protect Ireland !
Rather not

It is too early to confront the imperialists..
War will solve this !
The Germans refuses to protect us
Government of the German Empire has ignored our call for help, leaving us to deal with powerfull armed forces of the Union of Britain alone...
Accept British demands...
We shall protect our freedom !
British demands

A high level envoy from the Union of Britain has brought a plan that would guarentee our independence while giving them access to the military bases they need to secure the Atlantic ocean. It is likely that a negative answer will not be taken well....
Refuse their absurd demands !
Accept British demands...
Irish submission

The free state of Ireland, without any serious international backing was forced to accept our demands to grant us military access and signed non-agression pact with us. Once more the British diplomacy achieved a grand victory !
Job well done!
Irish resistance
The foolish leadership of Ireland has rejected our grand offer and thus Ireland remains as potential threat to the security of our homeland. How shall we react to this insolence ?
Ireland must become a socialist republic !
Back down.
The Irish capitulation

We have occupied most of Ireland's major cities and defeated the Irish Republican army. The tyrant Michael Collins and his cronies have gone underground but won't escape the people's justice for long!
column9: Мы заняли большую часть ирландских городов и разгромили Ирландскую республиканскую армию. Тиран Майкл Коллинз и его соратники ушли в подполье, но им не долго скрыться от народного правосудия!

column2: Set up a Syndicalist government in Dublin!
Rule Ireland directly!
British annexation of Ireland

Recently, our British comrades overthrew the corrupt dictatorship of Michael Collins in Ireland. However, instead of putting in power a socialist government in Ireland, they have instead chosen to annex the island. Our Irish-American citizens are outraged, calling it unsocialist and an act of imperialism, and are demanding that Britain release Ireland. As a result, we will have to choose a stance on this issue.
Demand they release Ireland!
We support the reunification of the British Isles under socialism!
Stay out of it.
CSA demands we release Ireland

The Combined Syndicates of America have demanded that we release Ireland, calling our recent reunification of the British Isles unsocialist and an act of imperialism. How should we respond to these demands?
Give into their demands
We refuse!
Union of Britain refuses our demands
The Union of Britain has refused our demands to release Ireland. How should we respond?
Enforce an embargo on Britain.
Nothing we can do..
CSA embargoes Britain
The Combined Syndicates of America have responded to our refusal of their demands by embargoing us.
So be it!
Maybe we should reconsider..
CTU Chairman election

Before the Second International Congress is held, a new Chairman has to be elected in order to replace comrade Philip Snowden. Oswald Mosley's Maximists have become the strongest party of the CTU, but still the opposition may be powerful enough to stall Mosley's election. As an alternative, the opposition may attempt to force Tom Mann as the Chairman.
The election is stalled
Mosley becomes the Chairman
The opposition forces Tom Mann through
Arthur Horner's gamble

Disappointed with the current lack of progress, comrade Horner has proposed that he himself will the candidate for the Chairman's post, should the Maximists and the opposition continue to squabble. Horner's authority in the CTU is undeniable, so it almost sure he'll become the Chairman. However, if something goes wrong, his political career may be ended forever...
Long live Chairman Horner!
Comrade Mosley beats Horner and Mann
Comrade Mann beats Horner and Mosley
General Secretary under Oswald Mosley

Mosley's election gives the Maximists a perfect opportunity to deal with General Secretary Arthur Horner. Horner's authority in the CTU is doubtless and his loyalty to the Union is beyond reproach, but his moderate outlook on politics may become an obstacle to the Maximists' reform plans. We can appoint an alternative candidate or ignore the constitution, remove Horner from his post and merge the post of Chairman with the General Secretary, soldifying Mosley's power in the Union.
Horner stays in power
Select William Gallacher, leader of the Scottish syndicalists

column2: General Secretary under Arthur Horner

Horner's election to the Chairman post means that the period of uncertainity and lack of confidence in British politics is over. However, since the constitution forbids merging the two highest posts in the country with any other, the new Chairman is to nominate a new General Secretary. As the leader of the Maximists, Oswald Mosley is the most suitable candidate, politically. However, his extreme ambitions may turn out to be dangerous, should he plan to expand his powers further on.
Oswald Mosley, the leader of the Maximists
Wiliam Gallacher, leader of the Scottish syndicalists
column9: Выбрать Уильяма Галлахера, лидера шотландских синдикалистов

column2: Eric Blair, writer and former militia commander

column2: Tom Mann, the former Chairman candidate
column9: Выбрать Тома Манна, бывшего кандита на пост председателя

column2: General Secretary under Oswald Mosley

Mosley's election gives the Maximists a perfect opportunity to place someone loyal as the General Secretary. Horner's loyalty towards Britain and his authority in the CTU is doubtless, but his moderate outlook in politics may become an obstacle to the Maximists' reform plans. Plus, his reckless resignation from the post makes removing him all too easy. The alternative is always to ignore the constitution and merge the post of Chairman with the General Secretary, soldifying Mosley's power in the Union.
Niclas y Glais, Welsh poet and socialist activist

column2: The Exchequer's post

With Mosley securing his power in the CTU, he has to make up his mind about the Exchequer's office. His retaining his post would create a concentration of power that is not only prohibited by the Union's constitution, but may also affect the quality of Maximist rule. The only problem is choosing a suitable candidate.
Abe Moffat, director of the Coventry Machine Plants
David Kirkwood, former militia commander
Nye Bevan, creator of the Union's Health Service
column9: Эньюрин Бивен, создатель Службы здравоохранения Союза

column2: Mosley has proven his efficiency and shall remain despite the constitution!
column9: Мосли доказал свою эффективность и должен остаться несмотря на конституцию!

Aneurin Bevan, a well known Welsh labour activist has died yesterday. Workers all over Britain will remember him forever.
column9: Эньюрин Бивен, известный валлийский рабочий активист, умер вчера. Рабочие всей Британии будут помнить его всегда.

column2: Memento mori
Wells Proposes a World Encyclopadia

Herbert George Wells has just presented, before the Republican Institution, plans for the compilation of a constantly growing and changing World Encyclopadia, to be reviewed by outstanding authorities and made accessible to every human being.
column9: Сегодня Герберт Джордж Уэллс выступил в Республиканском институте с предложением о создании Всемирной энциклопедии, которая соберет все человеческие знания и будет доступна акждому человеку.

column2: African conference of the Internationale

Together with our friends from Italy and Britain, the Commune has organized a grand Confйrence Africaine de l'Internationale in Paris. For the next few weeks, representatives of Syndicalist parties and groups from Europe, the Americas, the Middle East, and Africa will debate the situation in Africa - mainly, what will be the course of action towards the repressive regimes of National France, Mittelafrika, and the Portuguese colonies.
Let the debates start!
Beginning of the African conference of the Internationale

column9: Итоги конференции Интернационала по вопросам Африки

column2: For several days, passionate debates were held by the participants of the Confйrence Africaine de l'Internationale. Now the Commune and the other fellow Syndicalist powers will define their course of action towards Africa.
column9: В течение нескольких дней проходили активные дебаты между участниками конференции Интернационала по вопросам Африки. Наконец Французская Коммуна и остальные синдикалистские силы должны составить план действий в Африке.

column2: We reaffirm our full compromise to the liberation of the peoples of Africa
column9: Мы вновь подтверждаем наше согласие по вопросу освобождения народов Африки.

column2: Angola and the CNT-FAI

Our friends in the Federaciуn Anarquista Ibйrica have, since their conflict with Portugal, been in control of Angola. In order to keep to our compromise of full liberation for the African nations, we should present the Spanish with a request for the complete independence of that nation.
Present our request to the Spanish
We shouldn't bother them
Angola and the CNT-FAI

Our friends in the Federaciуn Anarquista Ibйrica have, since their conflict with Portugal, been controlling Angola as a semi-autonomous region. In order to keep to our compromise of full liberation for the African nations, we should present the Spanish with a request for the complete independence of that nation.
Present our request to the Spanish
We shouldn't botter them
Angola and the CNT-FAI

In accordance to the manifesto issued following the Confйrence Africaine de l'Internationale, Africa should be under the control of the African peoples themselves. However, our country has, since our conflict with Portugal, been controlling the Angola region. The Commune of France has requested that we grant the Angolans independence.
Accept the French request - full independence for Angola
Grant them a semi-autonomous status within the CNT-FAI
Refuse - Angola is an integral part of our country
Angola and the CNT-FAI

In accordance to the manifesto issued following the Confйrence Africaine de l'Internationale, Africa should be under the control of the African peoples themselves. However, our country has, since our conflict with Portugal, been controlling the Angola region as a semi-autonomous region. The Commune of France has requested that we grant the Angolans independence.
Accept the French request - grant full independence for Angola!
The Autonomous Region of Angola is an integral part of the FAI!
column9: Автономная область Ангола - часть нашей страны

column2: The Autonomous Region of Angola
We are now ready to transform Angola into an autonomous region of the Federaciуn Anarquista Ibйrica.
column9: Ангола — автономная область в составе ФАИ

Present our request to the Spanish

Accept the French request - full independence for Mozambique
Grant them a semi-autonomous status within the CNT-FAI
Refuse - Mozambique is an integral part of our country
Mozambique and the CNT-FAI

In accordance to the manifesto issued following the Confйrence Africaine de l'Internationale, Africa should be under the control of the African peoples themselves. However, our country has, since our conflict with Portugal, been controlling the Mozambique region as a semi-autonomous region. The Commune of France has requested that we grant independence to them.
Accept the French request - grant full independence for Mozambique!
Autonomous Mozambique is an integral part of the FAI!
column9: Автономная область Мозамбик - часть нашей страны

column2: The Autonomous Region of Mozambique

column9: Мы готовы превратить Анголу в автономную область в составе Федерации анархистов Иберии

column2: Proceed
Syndicalism and the Portuguese Empire

In accordance to the Confйrence Africaine de l'Internationale, Africa should be under the control of the native peoples themselves. However, even with our conversion to a Socialist system, Portugal is still holding firm to its centuries-old empire. Day by day, our biggest colonies, Angola and Mozambique, are becoming a powder keg. What should we do?
Comply with the Confйrence - Complete independence for Angola and Mozambique
We should create two semi-independent Autonomous Regions for them
They have been Portuguese for centuries, and they shall continue to be so
The Autonomous Regions
We are now ready to transform Mozambique and Angola into autonomous regions of the Portuguese Republic.
column9: Мы готовы преобразовать Мозамбик и Анголу в автономные области в составе Португальской Республики

column2: Proceed
African National Congress seeks help from Paris
column9: Африканский национальный конгресс просит помощи у Парижа

column2: After the Confйrence Africaine de l'Internationale has decided on supporting Socialist groups in Africa, the leaders of the clandestine ANC have departed once again to Paris in order to secure help from the Commune of France and other foreign powers in overthrowing our government!
Troubles are coming!
The African National Congress approaches us

Upon hearing the Confйrence's decision of fully supporting Socialist groups in Africa, South Africa's ANC (African National Congress), which represents the opressed black population of that country, has sent its leaders to Paris once again. They have approached us with a plan for an uprising which will replace the repressive regime with a black-majority Socialist government.
Full aid shall be given
column9: Гарантировать независимость Тайваня и отправить военных советников

column2: The ANC is on their own
Workers' strike in Cape Town
We have just received reports that clandestine trade unions affiliated with the African National Congress have launched a series of industrial strikes in Cape Town.
column9: Только что получено сообщение о том, что подпольные профсоюзы, подталкиваемые Африканским национальным конгрессом, начали серию забастовок на заводах Кейптауна

column2: It's just a strike... Just that, right?
column9: Это всего лишь забастовка... Ведь так?

column2: ANC riots spread

What started just as a series of strikes has increased to a major riot in Cape Town, as both black and white workers have taken the streets. Sympatizing police officers and army detachments have joined the protesters, as they attempt to reach the Parliament building.
Resist their feeble effort!
Try to negotiate with moderate strikers!
Give in to their demands!
Negotiating with the strikers

An attempt to negotiate with the striking workers has been made. All political forces in the country are closely watching the meeting, hoping that the strike will become a stimulus for further reforms in South Africa.
column9: Мы предприняли попытку провести переговоры с бастующими рабочими. Все политические силы в стране внимательно наблюдают за встречей в надежде, что забастовка станет сигналом к проведению в Южной Африке реформ.

column2: Stall the negotiations and send in the army!
Reach an agreement, but implement only social reforms
Reach an agreement, but implement only economic reforms
Reach a complete agreement
General Uprising!

The protesters have stormed the Parliament building in Cape Town! While most of our government has managed to flee to Pretoria on time, the workers have proclaimed an ANC-ruled People's Republic of South Africa. We now have a full-scale civil war in our hands!
Oh, great
Uprising in South Africa
Following the directives of the Confйrence, the African National Congress has launched an uprising in South Africa. Should we send them help?
column9: Решения конференции Интернационала по вопросам Африки вызвали восстание Африканского национального конгресса против правительства Южной Африки. Мы пошлем им помощь?

column2: Send them volunteers

column2: Those damn Brits!
Socialist uprising in South Africa

The Syndicalist-inspired African National Congress has launched a major uprising in South Africa! This could be the start of a series of events which could spill into Mittelafrika itself! So, should we send troops to our neighbours?
column9: Синдикалистский Африканский национальный конгресс поднял крупное восстание в Южной Африке! В случае успеха синдикалистская чума может перекинуться на Срединную Африку! Возможно, нам стоит направить войска в помощь нашим соседям?

column2: Send volunteers to South Africa
They can't harm us
Mittelafrikan volunteers
The Mittelafrikans have offered us volunteer troops in order to help us against the ANC uprising.
column9: Срединная Африка направила к нам добровольцев, чтобы помочь в борьбе против восстания АНК.

column2: We need all the help we can get
We don't need help of their kind
ANC uprising crushed
As we managed to defeat the rebel forces in all their strongholds, the uprising has been declared over.
column9: После разгрома повстанческих центров сопротивления восстанию пришел конец

column2: Good
Government overthrown - Johannesburg occupied by the rebels!
The rebel troops have occupied our capital and installed a new Socialist government!
column9: Повстанцы заняли нашу столицу, Йоханнесбург, и сформировали новое социалистическое правительство

column2: Good
The new cabinet
As the African National Congress has assumed power, they have called a new cabinet.
column9: После прихода к власти АНК сформировал новое правительство

column2: Good
Reinforcing our authority
In order to legitimize our new regime, we must send our troops to those provinces that saw combat during the conflict.
column9: Для укрепления нового режима мы должны отправить войска во все провинции, затронутые боевыми действиями во время гражданской войны

column2: Good
The End of the South African civil war
column9: Конец гражданской войны в Южной Африке

column2: For good or ill, the South African civil war is now over.  The General Staff have reported that they learnt many valuable lessons regarding the nature of modern warfare over the course of the conflict.
column9: К добру или к худу, гражданская война в Южной Африке закончена. Генеральный штаб сообщает, что война позволила нам получить множество ценных уроков по ведению современной войны.

column2: Great!

Comitй pour la Libйration de Guinйe seeks help from the Commune
column9: Комитет освобождения Гвинеи просит помощи у Парижа

column2: After the Confйrence Africaine de l'Internationale has decided on supporting Socialist groups in Africa, the leaders of the clandestine Comitй pour la Libйration de Guinйe (Guinean Liberation Committee) have departed once again to Paris in order to secure help from the Commune of France and other foreign powers in overthrowing our government!
Troubles are coming!
Syndicalism in Guinea

Upon hearing the Confйrence's decision of fully supporting Socialist groups in Africa, leaders of the Comitй pour la Libйration de Guinйe (Guinean Liberation Comitee) have arrived in Paris once again to discuss a plan for a great Socialist revolution in West Africa, against the repressive regime of National France.
Support the Guineans! Death to National France!
The Guineans are on their own, sorry
column9: Извините, но Гвинея сама по себе

column2: Syndicalist unrest in the southern territories

We have received reports from our provincial governments in the southern territories that the clandestine Comitй pour la Libйration de Guinйe has sponsored a major strike in the regional capital of Conakry. The locals are asking for a broad set of left-wing reforms.
Send the army to restore order!
Try to negotiate with the locals!
Negotiating with the locals

An attempt to negotiate with the revolting local population in Guinea has been made. All political forces in the country are closely watching the meeting, hoping that the unrest will become a stimulus for further reforms in the French state.
column9: Мы предприняли попытку переговоров с восставшим населением Гвинеи. Все политические силы страны следят за встречей в надежде, что она станет толчком к реформам.

column2: Stall the negotiations and send in the army!
Try to appease them
Result of negotiations
Our offer to the revolting population was received by representatives of revolters and now we are awaiting their response...
column9: Наши предложения отправлены представителям восставших и теперь мы ждем их ответа...

column2: Our offer was refused!
Our offer was accepted!
Revolts in Guinea!

Shocking news have arrived from Conakry! Armed bands of militants of the Comitй pour la Libйration de Guinйe have seized control of the provincial government and declared the independence of the People's Republic of Guinea! More importantly, several army units in the region have switched sides and declared themselves loyal to the rebels!
Death to them!
Comitй pour la Libйration de Guinйe assumes control
The Comitй pour la Libйration de Guinйe has assumed control of the government of Guinea. Now we are ready to totally free West Africa from foreign domination!
column9: Комитет освобождения Гвинеи захватил власть над Гвинеей! Теперь мы готовы освободить Западную Африку от иностранных угнетателей!

column2: Workers of Africa, unite! We have noting to lose but our chains!
Uprising in Guinea
Following the directives of the Confйrence, the Comitй pour la Libйration de Guinйe has launched a Syndicalist revolution in National French-held Guinea. Should we send them help?
column9: Следуя решениям конференции Интернационала по вопросам Африки, Комитет освобождения Гвинеи организовал синдикалистскую революцию в Гвинее, принадлежащей Национальной Франции. Мы пошлем им помощь?

column2: Oh, great...
Support from the Western Africa

Other Socialist and Syndicalist groups from Western Africa have declared their support towards our rebellion and expressed their wishes to join our nation. This is the first step towards a People's Republic of Greater Guinea!
column9: Социалистические и синдикалистские организации Западной Африки объявляют о поддержке нашего восстания и желании присоединиться к нашему народу. Это первый шаг на пути к Народной Республике Великая Гвинея!

column2: Workers of Africa unite!
Support from Ivory Coast
Rebel bands from Ivory Coast have declared their support for our rebellion and expressed their wishes to join our nation.
Workers of Africa unite!
Support from Liberia
Rebel bands from Liberia have declared their support for our rebellion and expressed their wishes to join our nation.
Workers of Africa unite!
Support from Sierra Leone
Rebel bands from Sierra Leone have declared their support for our rebellion and expressed their wishes to join our nation.
Workers of Africa unite!
Support from Guinea-Bissau
Rebel bands from Guinea-Bissau have declared their support for our rebellion and expressed their wishes to join our nation.
Workers of Africa unite!
Sierra Leone and the Revolution
Our forces have surroundered the German colony of Sierra Leone. Should we instruct the CLG supporters to try seize control over Sierra-Leone and join our Socialist motherland?
column9: Наши войска окружили германскую колонию Сьерра-Леоне. Среди ее населения много людей, поддерживающих Комитет освобождения Гвинеи. Возможно, нам стоит подтолкнуть их к захвату власти в колонии и присоединению к нашей социалистической Родине?

column2: Begin fostering a revolution in Sierra Leone
This is too risky..
Sierra Leone joins the Guinean Revolution
Our colony of Sierra Leone has been taken by armed syndicalist bands and joined the present revolution in Guinea!
column9: Наша колония Сьерра-Леоне захвачена вооруженными бандами синдикалистов и присоединилась к гвинейской революции!

column2: There is nothing we can do..
They will regret this... To War!
Liberia

Our forces are approaching the independent Republic of Liberia, which is currently divided between supporters of our revolution and those sympatizing with their fragile democracy. Maybe we could foster a Socialist revolt there...?
column9: Наши силы приближаются к независимой республике Либерия, которая в настоящее время разделена между сторонниками нашей революции и поддерживающими их хрупкую демократию. Возможно, мы могли бы поспособствовать социалистическому восстанию в этой стране?

column2: Attempt an uprising in Liberia
This is too dangerous
Syndicalist coup
Socialist mobs sympatizing with the Guinean revolution are attempting to take over our government!
column9: Социалисты, поддерживающие гвинейскую революцию, пытаются свергнуть наше правительство!

column2: Coup succeddes!
The presidential guard fights off the revolutionaries!
Liberian revolution fails
The attempted uprising of Liberian workers has failed...
We must invervene - Declare war on Liberia
Leave them be..
The fate of Liberia
We are currently controlling the former Republic of Liberia. What should we do about it? Should we integrate it fully into Guinea or it would be best to completelly liberate them?
column9: Мы взяли под контроль бывшую Республику Либерия. Как мы поступим с ней? Присоединим к Гвинее или предоставим независимость?

column2: Liberia is a part of Guinea
Grant them independence
Alliance with Guinea?
Now that a Syndicalist government has taken over Liberia, should we join the Guineans in their fight for the freedom of Western Africa?
column9: Теперь, когда Либерией управляет синдикалистское правительство, должны ли мы присоединиться к Гвинее в борьбе за освобождение Западной Африки?

column2: Join the fight with our Guinean brothers!
We don't want to get involved in any war
The end of the Revolution
The forces of the French Republic have defeated the Syndicalist bandits based from Guinea. Peace now returns to our southern territories.
column9: Армия Франции разгромила синдикалистских бандитов в Гвинее. На наши южные территории вернулся мир.

column2: Great!
Glorious victory
The forces of the Guineian People's Republic have defeated the French capitalist oppressors. Peace now returns to our southern territories.
column9: Армия Народной Республики Гвинея разгромила французских капиталистических угнетателей.

column2: Great!
The End of the Guineian uprising
For good or ill, the Guineian uprising is now over.  The General Staff have reported that they learnt many valuable lessons regarding the nature of modern warfare over the course of the conflict.

column2: Great!
Parti Socialiste Sйnйgalais and the Commune of France
column9: Социалистическая партия Сенегала и Французская Коммуна

column2: As the Commune of France and the other syndicalist powers have decided on supporting revolutionary movements in Africa, clearly aimed at destroying our French Republic, leaders of the clandestine Senegalese Socialist Party have departed to Paris in order to secure help from our enemies.
There they go...
Socialism in Senegal?

Leaders of the Parti Socialiste Sйnйgalais (Senegalese Socialist Party) have arrived in Paris this morning, as they wish to secure help from the Commune and the other powers of the Internationale in achieving their independence from the reactionary rйgime of National France.
They have our support
They are on their own
The Rassamblement Syndicaliste Africain

Following the example of the Senegalese Socialists, the Mali-based Rassamblement Syndicaliste Africain (African Syndicalist Rally) has also sent its leaders to seek support from the Commune of France.
column9: Африканский синдикалистский союз, действующий в Мали, последовал примеру сенегальских социалистов и отправил своих представителей искать помощи у Французской Коммуны

column2: So... They are leaving too?
A Revolution in Mali?

Following the example of other African groups, leaders of the Mali-based Rassamblement Syndicaliste Africain (African Syndicalist Rally) have arrived in our country today. They say their militants are ready to overthrow the oppressive rule of National France!
Support the Rassamblement Syndicaliste
They are on their own
Unrest in Dakar
We have received reports from our provincial government in Senegal that the Parti Socialiste Sйnйgalais has sponsored a worker's strike in Dakar.
column9: Мы получаем доклады от местного правительства Сенегала, согласно которым Синдикалистская партия Сенегала спонсирует забастовку рабочих в Дакаре

column2: Not this again!
Senegalese and Malian syndicalist groups unite

According to our intelligence services, leaders of both the Parti Socialiste Sйnйgalais and the Rassamblement Syndicaliste Africain have decided on a merger of their groups, forming the Front Sahelienne (Sahelian Front), a united organization against our government!
Try to break them apart!
Negotiations will solve this
Negotiating with the locals

An attempt to negotiate with the revolting local population in Sahel and Mali has been made. All political forces in the country are closely watching the meeting, hoping that the unrest will become a stimulus for further reforms in the French state.
column9: Предпринята попытка переговоров с восставшим населением в Сахеле и Мали. Все политические силы страны пристально следят за встречей в надежде, что эти беспорядки станут толчком к реформам в Национальной Франции

column2: Stall the negotiations and send in the army!
Try to appease them
Result of negotiations
Our offer to the revolting population was received by representatives of the revolters and now we are awaiting their response...
column9: Наши предложения переданы представителям восставших. Теперь мы должны ждать ответа...

column2: Our offer was refused!
Our offer was accepted!
Front Sahelienne

According to a report submited to our diplomatic services, leaders of both the Parti Socialiste Sйnйgalais and the Rassamblement Syndicaliste Africain have decided on a merger of their groups, forming the Front Sahelienne (Sahelian Front), a united organization against the oppression of National France!
Great!
Revolts in Senegal and Mali!

Armed militiamen of the Front Sahelienne have seized control of all government centres in Senegal and Mali! More importantly, several army units in the region have switched sides and declared themselves loyal to the rebels!
column9: Вооруженные боевики Сахельского фронта взяли под контроль всю территорию Сенегала и Мали! Что еще хуже, несколько армейских подразделений перешли на сторону восставших!

column2: Death to them!
Front Sahelienne proclaims the Sahelian Republic
The Front Sahelienne has assumed control of the government of Mali and Senegal. Now we are ready to totally free West Africa from foreign domination!
column9: Сахельский фронт взял под контроль Мали и Сенегал. Теперь мы готовы полностью освободить Западную Африку от иностранных оккупантов!

column2: Workers of Africa, unite! We have noting to lose but our chains!
Uprising in the Sahel
Following the directives of the Confйrence, the Front Sahelienne has launched a revolution in the Senegalese and Malian territories of National France. Should we send them help?
column9: В соответствии с решениями конференции, Сахельский фронт организовал революцию в Сенегале и Мали, принадлежащих Национальной Франции. Мы пошлем им помощь?

column2: Send them volunteers
Spread Socialist propaganda amongst the reactionary officers
Stay out of it

French Volunteers
The Commune of France has sent us volunteer troops!
column9: Французская Коммуна прислала нам добровольческие части!

column2: Great!
British Volunteers
The Union of Britain has sent us volunteer troops!
column9: Британский Союз прислал нам на помощь добровольческие части!

column2: Great!
CNT-FAI Volunteers
The Federaciуn Anarquista Ibйrica has sent us volunteer troops!
column9: Федерация Анархистов Иберии прислала нам на помощь добровольческие части!

column2: Great!
American Volunteers
The Combined Syndicates of America have sent us volunteer troops!
column9: Объединенные Синдикаты Америки прислали нам на помощь добровольческие части!

column2: Great!
Soviet Volunteers
The Soviet state has sent us volunteer troops!
column9: Советское правительство прислало нам на помощь добровольческие части!

column2: Great!
Russian Volunteers
Russia has sent us volunteer troops!
column9: Россия прислала нам на помощь добровольческие части!

column2: Great!
Propaganda campaign from the Commune
The Commune of France has spread Socialist propaganda amongst our troops... Some of them have defected and joined the Sahelian rebellion!
column9: Французская Коммуна распространяет в наших войсках социалистическую пропаганду... Солдаты дезертируют и примыкают к восставшим!

column2: Oh, the communards...
British Propaganda campaign
The Union of Britain has spread Socialist propaganda amongst our troops... Some of them have defected and joined the Sahelian rebellion!
column9: Британский Союз распространяет в наших войсках социалистическую пропаганду... Солдаты дезертируют и примыкают к восставшим!

column2: Their mothers are hamsters and their fathers smell of elderberries!
column9: Их матери хомяки, а отцы воняют бузиной!

column2: Propaganda campaign from the Spanish
The CNT-FAI has spread Socialist propaganda amongst our troops... Some of them have defected and joined the Sahelian rebellion!

column2: Those Russians...
Support from Mauretania
Syndicalist groups from Mauretania have declared their support for our rebellion and expressed their wishes to join our nation. Some militants have even crossed the French lines and joined our army!
column9: Синдикалистские организации из Мавретании объявили о поддержке нашего восстания и желании присоединиться к нему. Их боевики просачиваются через линию фронта и присоединяются к нашей армии!

column2: Isn't it great?
Support from Niger and Chad

Syndicalist groups from Niger and Chad have declared their support for our rebellion and expressed their wishes to join our nation. Some militants have even crossed the French lines and joined our army!
column9: Синдикалистские организации из Нигера и Чада объявили о поддержке нашего восстания и желании присоединиться к нему. Их боевики просачиваются через линию фронта и присоединяются к нашей армии!

column2: Isn't it great?
Alliance with Guinea?
Just like us, the Guineans are also undertaking a liberation struggle against National France. According to the dictates of the Confйrence, all African independence movements should join forces!
column9: Как и мы, гвинейцы ведут борьбу против Национальной Франции. В соответствии с решениями Конференции, все африканские движения за независимость должны объединить силы!

column2: Invite them into an alliance
We are better alone, actually
The Sahelians propose an alliance
Just like us, the Sahelians are also undertaking a liberation struggle against National France. According to the dictates of the Confйrence, all African independence movements should join forces!
column9: Как и мы, сахельцы ведут борьбу против Национальной Франции. В соответствии с решениями Конференции, все африканские движения за независимость должны объединить силы!

column2: Accept their proposal - an alliance of African socialists!
We are better alone, actually
The end of the Revolution
The forces of the French Republic have defeated the Syndicalist bandits based from Sahel. Peace now returns to our southern territories.
column9: Армия Национальной Франции разгромила синдикалистских бандитов из Сахеля. На южные территории вернулся мир

column2: Great!
Glorious victory
The forces of the Sahelian republic have soundly defeated the capitalist French oppressors. Peace now returns to the western Africa.
column9: Армия Сахельской Республики разгромила войска капиталистических французских угнетателей. Мир вернулся в Западную Африку

column2: Great!
The End of the Sahelian uprising
For good or ill, the Sahelian uprising is now over.  The General Staff have reported that they learnt many valuable lessons regarding the nature of modern warfare over the course of the conflict.
column9: К добру или к худу, сахельское восстание закончено. Генеральный штаб сообщает, что война позволила нам получить множество ценных уроков по ведению современной войны.

column2: Great!

column2: Great!
Support from the Sahara
Rebel bands from southern Algeria have declared their support for our rebellion and expressed their wishes to join our nation.
column9: Партизанские отряды из южного Алжира объявили, что поддерживают нас и хотят присоединиться к нашему восстанию

column2: Isn't it great?
Algerian Socialists and the Commune

As the Commune-supported Confйrence Africaine de l'Internationale has declared its role as instigator of African independence movements, the very core of our French Republic may soon suffer from unrest. Leaders of the Algiers-based Йtoile Nord-Africaine (ENA), an organization bringing together socialist-sympatizing Pied-Noirs and Algerian nationalists, are on their way to Paris in order to secure further support from the Commune and the Union of Britain.
Here comes troubles!
Syndicalism in North Africa

Upon hearing the Confйrence's decision of fully supporting socialist groups in Africa, leaders of the Algiers-based Йtoile Nord-Africaine (ENA) have arrived in Paris once again to discuss a plan for a great socialist revolution in Northern Africa, against the repressive regime of National France.
Support the Algerians!
The ENA are on their own, sorry
Syndicalist unrest in Algerie
We have received reports from that the clandestine Йtoile Nord-Africaine has sponsored a major strike in our own capital, Algiers!
column9: ЭНА организовала крупную забастовку в нашей столице!

column2: This is not good...
The situation in Algerie
Oh, very interesting!
Protests in Tunis!
After the recent strikes in Algiers, the Йtoile Nord-Africaine has extended their operations and sponsored a series of Protests in Tunis, the capital of our Tunisian protectorate.
column9: После недавних забастовок в Алжире ЭНА расширила свою деятельность и организовала серию демонстраций в Тунисе, столице нашего тунисского протектората.

column2: The army will suppress this revolt!
Try to negotiate with the revolters!
Negotiating with the locals

An attempt to negotiate with the revolting local population in the Algerian and Tunisian protectorates has been made. All political forces in the country are closely watching the meeting, hoping that the unrest will become a stimulus for further reforms in the French state.
Stall the negotiations and send in the army!
Try to appease them
Result of negotiations
Our offer to the revolting population was received by the representatives of revolters and now we are awaiting their response...
column9: Наши предложения переданы представителям восставших. Теперь мы должны ждать ответа...

column2: Our offer was refused!
Our offer was accepted!
Revolts in North Africa!

Today, the syndicalist bandits have struck right on the heart of our Republic. Armed militants of the Йtoile Nord-Africaine, with suspected help from the Commune of France, have rebelled and taken over all the land between Tunis and Algiers. Several army units in the region have also switched sides and declared themselves loyal to the rebels!
Death to them!
The birth of independent Algerie
The ENA has assumed control of all land between Tunis and Algiers. Now we are ready to implement Syndicalism in North Africa!
column9: ЭНА контролирует территорию от Туниса до Алжира. Теперь мы готовы принести синдикализм в Северную Африку!

column2: Death to National France!
Uprising in Algerie
Following the directives of the Confйrence, the ENA has launched a revolution in the Algerian and Tunisian territories of National France. Should we send them help?
column9: В соответствии с решениями конференции, ЭНА организовала революцию в Алжире и Тунисе, принадлежащих Национальной Франции. Мы пошлем им помощь?

Returning Algeria to the French

Following the fall of Nationalist France, we were left in control of a good part of their Mediterranean coast. Due to the significant presence of Europeans in those territories, our friends in the Commune are requesting ownership of those lands.

The fate of Algйria and Tunis

Following the fall of Nationalist France, we were left in control of a good part of their Mediterranean coast, inhabitted by many Europeans and Arabs. Should we constitute two independent republics of Algйrie and Tunisia, integrate them into our homeland or create one single Grand Algйrie from Oran to Tunis ?
Algйrie will be ruled from Paris, and independence for Tunisia
Algйrie and Tunisia are integral parts of the Commune
Proclaim a single 'sister republic' in all of North Africa
Autonomy for both Algйrie and Tunisia

The reestructurization of Centroafrika

With the Syndicalists in power in Centroafrika, we are might either try to get rid of our colonial structure and reform into a true African nation: the Bantu Federation or try and keep exisitng colonial structures intact....
column9: После прихода синдикалистов к власти в Центральной Африке, было выдвинуто предложение реформировать существующую колониальную администрацию и провозгласить новое государство, Федерацию Банту.

column2: We cannot keep the old structures
Keep existing structures intact
The Birth of the Bantu Federation
The fathers of our nation are ready to assume their posts in the capital.
column9: Отцы нашей страны готовы занять свои посты в столице.

column2: Great
Foreign policy

With the Central African states finally free from German capitalist oppression we can now freely decide our stance towards the international community. While many are arguing fo anr immediate alliance with other Syndicalist nations, it might be wise enough to remain neutral to rebuild our country.
We must join arms with France
Isolationism, we must organize our country
Bantu Federation wants to join the Internationale
column9: Федерация Банту хочет вступить в Интернационал

column2: The Government of the Bantu Federation has annouced recently that they want to join the Syndicalist bloc. After all, don't we all want African workers joing the crusade against bloodthirsty Germans and rotten imperialist Canadian pigs?
column9: Правительство Федерации Банту заявило, что их страна хочет присоединиться к синдикалистскому блоку. В конце концов, разве мы не хотим чтобы африканские рабочие присоединились к крестовому походу против кровожадных немцев и империалистских канадских свиней?

column2: Welcome them
We are not ready to mess in Africa already
column9: Мы не готовы действовать в Африке

column2: We have joined the Internationale
French and British are happy to see us joining their common case - destroying the evil imperialists. Now we are part of the Syndicalist bloc
column9: Французы и британцы рады приветствовать нас в общем деле — уничтожении империалистов. Теперь мы часть Интернационала.

column2: This time we will win!
East African Front seeks help from the Commune
column9: Восточный Африканский Фронт просит помощи у Коммуны

column2: After the Confйrence Africaine de l'Internationale has decided on supporting Socialist groups in Africa, the leaders of the clandestine East African Front have departed once again to Paris in order to secure help from the Commune of France and other foreign powers in overthrowing our government!
Here comes troubles..!
Syndicalism in the East Africa

Upon hearing the Confйrence's decision of fully supporting socialist groups in Africa, leaders of the Tanganyka-based East African Front have arrived in Paris once again to discuss a plan for a great Socialist revolution against the repressive regime of Mittelafrika.
Support them!
The EAF is on its own, sorry
Syndicalist unrest in Ostafrika
We have received reports that the clandestine East African Front has sponsored a major strike in our own capital, Dar-es-Salaam. The locals are asking for a broad set of left-wing reforms.
column9: Мы получили информацию, что Восточный Африканский Фронт организовал забастовку в местной столице, Дар-эс-Саламе. Забастовщики требуют социальных реформ.

column2: This is not good...
Unrest in the Kongo
According to our security forces, the East African Front has established contact with socialist-sympatizing groups in the Kongo Distrikt, and are now planning a general uprising against us!
column9: По сообщениям наших спецслужб, Восточный Африканский Фронт установил контакт с социалистическими группами в Конго, и теперь они планируют всеобщее восстание против нас!

column2: Put all our hopes in the armed forces
Try to negotiate with the revolters
Negotiating with the locals

An attempt to negotiate with the revolting local population in the eastern parts of Mittelafrika has been made. All political forces in the country are closely watching the meeting, hoping that the unrest will become a stimulus for potential political and economic reforms in Mittelafrika.
Stall the negotiations and send in the army!
Try to appease them
Result of negotiations
Our offer to the revolting population was received by the representatives of the revolters and now we are awaiting their response...
column9: Наши предложения отправлены представителям восставших и теперь мы ждем их ответа...

column2: Our offer was refused!
Our offer was accepted!
Revolution!

Armed bands of militants of the East African Front have seized control of the provincial governments in Ostafrika and Kongo and declared the independence of the Bantu Federation! More importantly, several army units in the region have switched sides and declared themselves loyal to the rebels!
Death to them!
East African Front assumes control
Now we are ready to totally free East Africa from foreign domination!
column9: Теперь мы готовы полностью освободить Восточную Африку от иностранных захватчиков!

column2: Workers of Africa, unite! We have noting to lose but our chains!

column2: After the Confйrence Africaine de l'Internationale has decided on supporting socialist groups in Africa, the leaders of the clandestine Nigerian Syndicalist Party have departed once again to Paris in order to secure help from the Commune of France and other foreign powers in overthrowing our government!

Syndicalism in Nigeria

Upon hearing the Confйrence's decision of fully supporting socialist groups in Africa, leaders of the Nigerian Syndicalist Party have arrived in Paris once again to discuss a plan for a great Socialist revolution against the repressive regime of Mittelafrika.
Support them!
The Nigerians are on their own, sorry
Syndicalist unrest in Niger-Kamerun
We have received reports that the clandestine Nigerian Syndicalist Party has sponsored a major strike in the distrikt capital of Lagos. The locals are asking for a broad set of left-wing reforms.
column9: Мы получили информацию, что нелегальная Нигерийская синдикалистская партия организовал забастовку в местной столице, Лагосе. Забастовщики требуют социальных реформ.

column2: This is not good...
Unrest in Northern Kongo

According to our security forces, the Nigerian Syndicalist Party has established contact with socialist-sympatizing groups in the northern Kongo Distrikt, and are now planning a general uprising against us!
column9: По сообщениям наших спецслужб, Нигерийская синдикалистская партия установила контакт с социалистическими группами в Северном Конго, и теперь они планируют всеобщее восстание против нас!

column2: Send the army to supress revolts

Negotiating with the locals

An attempt to negotiate with the revolting local population in Guinea has been made. All political forces in the country are closely watching the meeting, hoping that the unrest will become a stimulus for further reforms.
column9: Мы предприняли попытку переговоров с восставшим населением Гвинеи. Все политические силы страны следят за встречей в надежде, что она станет толчком к реформам.

column2: Stall the negotiations and send army!

Death to them!

Now we are ready to totally free East Africa from foreign domination!

column2: Great!
Angolan Syndicalists depart for Paris

After the Confйrence Africaine de l'Internationale has decided on supporting socialist groups in Africa, the leaders of the Uniгo Africana (African Union), a socialist group based in Angola, have departed once again to Paris in order to secure help from the Commune of France and other foreign powers in overthrowing our government!
Oh, great!
Syndicalism in Angola

Upon hearing the Confйrence's decision of fully supporting socialist groups in Africa, leaders of the Uniгo Africana, a Syndicalist group based in Angola, have arrived in Paris once again to further discuss a plan for a great socialist revolution against the repressive Mittelafrikan colonial rйgime.
Support them!
The Angolans are on their own, sorry
Unrest in Angola
We have received reports that the Uniгo Africana has sponsored a major strike in the distrikt capital of Luanda. The locals are asking for a broad set of left-wing reforms.
column9: Мы получили информацию, что Африканский Союз организовал забастовку в колониальной столице, Сан-Паулу-ди-Луанда. Забастовщики требуют социальных реформ.

column2: Crush them !
Try to negotiate with revolters
Negotiating with the locals

An attempt to negotiate with the revolting local population in Angola has been made. All political forces in the country closely watch the meeting, hoping that unrest will become an impulse for political and economical reforms in Mittelafrika.
column9: Мы предприняли попытку переговоров с восставшим населением Анголы. Все политические силы страны следят за встречей в надежде, что она станет толчком к реформам.

column2: Stall the negotiations and send in the army!

column2: Our offer was refused!

column9: Вооруженные банды боевиков Африканского Союза захватили контроль над местными правительством Португальской Анголы и провозгласили независимость! Более того, несколько вооружённых подразделений в регионе объявили о переходе на сторону повстанцев!

column9: Французская Коммуна прислала нам добровольческие части!

column2: Great!
Propaganda campaign from the Commune
The Commune of France has spread Socialist propaganda amongst our troops... Some of them have defected and joined the Mozambican rebellion!
column9: Французская Коммуна распространяет в наших войсках социалистическую пропаганду... Солдаты дезертируют и примыкают к восставшим!

column2: Oh, great...
The end of the Mozambican Revolution
The armed forces of Mittelafrika have defeated the Syndicalist bandits based from Mosambik. Peace now returns to our distrikt!
column9: Армия Срединной Африки разгромила синдикалистских бандитов в Мозамбике. В колониях вернулся мир.

column2: Great!
Glorious victory
The armed forces of Mozambique have defeated the syndicalist bandits based from Mosambik. Peace now returns to our distrikt!
column9: Силы Мозамбика разгромили немецких капиталистических угнетателей. Мир возвращается в Мозамбик!

column2: Great!
The End of the Mozambique uprising
For good or ill, the Mozambique uprising is now over.  The General Staff have reported that they learnt many valuable lessons regarding the nature of modern warfare over the course of the conflict.
column9: К добру или к худу, мозамбикское восстание закончено. Генеральный штаб сообщает, что война позволила нам получить множество ценных уроков по ведению современной войны.

column2: Great!
Syndicalism threatening South Africa and Mittelafrika
column9: Синдикализм угрожает Южной Африке и Срединной Африке

column2: With the German Empire defeated in Europe, the Internationale has decided to bring their ideology of hate to the African continent. Not only South Africa, but both National France and Mittelafrika already had to deal with socialist uprisings over the past months. Due to this, some in our foreign services believe in crafting an alliance with our northern neighbours in Mittelafrika for our mutual protection.
Our security depends on that - Propose an alliance to Mittelafrika
column9: Наша безопасность зависит от этого - предложить союз Срединной Африке

column2: We don't need anything from Mittelafrika
column9: Нам ничего не надо от Срединной Африки

column2: Alliance proposal from South Africa

After a Syndicalist uprising by the African National Congress nearly toppled the government of South Africa, Johannesburg has sent us a proposal for an alliance in order to fight the red menace in our continent. Should we accept their proposal?
column9: После синдикалистского восстания Африканского Национального Конгресса, которое чуть было не свергло правительство Южной Африки, Йоханнесбург послал нам предложение сформировать альянс, для борьбы с красной угрозой на нашем континенте. Примем ли мы их предложение?

column2: Accept - Form the Johannesburg - Dar-es-Salaam axis
Refuse - We don't need anything from South Africa
column9: Отклонить - нам ничего не надо от Южной Африки

column2: Mittelafrika in chaos

The Freistaat Mittealfrika is facing major Syndicalist rebellions, which could very well result in South Africa being left with hostile left-wing powers right on her borders. But this crisis could also serve as an opportunity for us to expand our borders. We could minimize the threat by ordering our army to occupy the Mittelafrikan distrikt of Sudwestafrika (also known as Namibia), before the rebels have this same idea...
Seize the opportunity and occupy Namibia
We shouldn't annoy the Mittelafrikans
South Africa demands Sudwestafrika

While we are busy fighting the Syndicalist rebellion in our country, the treacherous South Africans have seized the opportunity and moved their troops towards our distrikt of Sudwestafrika, demanding that we surrender the territory! However, we could use this opportunity to guarantee their help: some of our ministers believe in exchanging the resource-poor distrikt for an alliance against Syndicalism.
There is nothing that we can do, surrender the territory
column9: Мы ничего не можем поделать, передать территории

column2: Propose an alliance in exchange for the territory
column9: Предложить альянс в обмен на передачу территорий

column2: We won't allow that to happen - Threaten war!
column9: Мы не позволим случиться этому - угрожать войной!

column2: Mittelafrikan proposal

As we announced our intention of seizing Namibia, the Mittelafrikan government has proposed that, in exchange for the territory, we should enter an alliance for our mutual protection against the Syndicalist bandits that are threatening both our countries.
column9: Как только мы объявили о нашем намерении занять Намибию, Срединная Африка предложила нам передачу территории, взамен на создание альянса против синдикалистских бандитов, которые угрожают обеим нашим странам.

column2: That's quite reasonable - Accept their proposal
column9: Это вполне разумно - принять их предложение

column2: Refuse - We don't really need Namibia anyway
Alliance with South Africa
South Africa has accepted our proposal. This is the birth of the Johannesburg Dar-es-Salaam Axis!
column9: Южная Африка приняла наше предложение. Рождение оси Йоханнесбург - Дар-эр-Салам!

column2: Great!
War against Mittelafrika?
As we announced our intention of seizing Namibia, the Mittelafrikan government has threatened us with war!
column9: Мы объявили о наших планах занятий Намибии, на что Срединная Африка угрожает нам войной!

column2: They may be weakened, but shouldn't be tempted!
column9: Они может быть ослаблены, но не надо поддаваться искушению!

column2: Then war it is! Ready the troops!
Mittelafrika in Chaos

The Freistaat Mittealfrika is facing major Syndicalist rebellions. Seize the opportunity and occupy Namibia

column2: There is nothing that we can do, surrender the territory
column9: Мы ничего не можем поделать, передать территории

column2: Then war it is! Ready the troops!
The Commune of Angola
With Mittelafrika defeated and great parts of their former territory in our hands, we now have the opportunity to declare the independence of a friendly Commune of Angola!
column9: После поражения Срединной Африки, большая ее часть в наших руках, мы можем провозгласить независимость дружественной Ангольской Коммуны!

column2: Grant them their independence
We'd rather keep rulling the area directly
The government of Angola
We have declared the independence of Angola. Now, should we grant them complete independence, or establish a puppet government there, so we can keep a close eye on them?
column9: Мы провозгласили независимость Анголы. Должны ли мы им дать полную независимость, или создать марионетку, чтобы приглядывать за ней?

column2: They shall have complete indepedence
Establish a pupp- Ahm... A 'Sister Republic'

column2: Amazing
Bantu-Mittelafrika war resumes
After a short cease-fire, we have received reports that Mittelafrika is again preparing an offensive against us!
column9: После короткого перемирия, мы получили сообщение, что Срединная Африка вновь готовит атаку против нас!

column2: Death to Mittelafrika
We're happy with the cease-fire
Beninkongo-Mittelafrika war resumes
After a short cease-fire, we have received reports that Mittelafrika is again preparing an offensive against us!
column9: После короткого перемирия, мы получили сообщение, что Срединная Африка вновь готовит атаку против нас!

column2: Death to the reactionaries
We're happy with the cease-fire
Relations with the Internationale
With the war against Mittelafrika over, we are ready to fully establish diplomatic relations with the Internationale powers.
column9: С окончанием войны против Срединной Африки, мы готовы установить дипломатические отношения с державами Интернационала.

column2: Contact them
Let's not bother them
Relations with Beninkongo

As the war against Mittelafrika has reached its end, representatives from Beninkongo have contacted us in order to fully establish diplomatic relations. Also, if we currently hold any of territory claimed by them, they will be returned.
column9: С окончанием войны против Срединной Африки, представители Бенинконго готовы установить дипломатические отношения. Также, если мы занимаем территории, на которые они претендуют, мы вернем эти земли.

column2: Establish diplomatic relations
Actually, we wouldn't mind owning these lands
column9: На самом деле, мы не хотим отказываться от этих земель

column9: С окончанием войны против Срединной Африки, представители Федерации Банту готовы установить дипломатические отношения. Также, если мы занимаем территории, на которые они претендуют, мы вернем эти земли.

column2: The office of general secretary

Arthur Horner has become the new chairman of the Congress of Trade Unions. This is seen by many as the start of a new age in British politics, and many people are urging Horner to quickly choose a new General Secretary.
column9: Артур Хорнер стал новым председателем Конгресса профсоюзов. Многие видят в этом начало новой эпохи в британской политике, и многие убеждают Хорнера быстро выбрать нового генерального секретаря.

column2: The Congregationalists are our closest allies
A compromise with the Maximists is in order
column9: Мы должны достичь компромисса с максимистами

column2: Place total confidence in the abilities of Tom Mann
column9: Том Манн отлично справится с этой должностью

column2: Amend the law and merge the offices of Chairman and General Secretary
column9: Совместить должности председателя и генерального секретаря

column2: The office of general secretary

Oswald Mosley has become the new chairman of the Congress of Trade Unions. This is seen by many as the start of a new age in British politics, and many people are urging Oswald to remove Arthur Horner in order to remove the last remains of the old system of government.
Niclas y Glais would make a much better general secretary
column9: Никлас и Глайс будет лучшим генеральным секретарем

column2: Eric Blair is the best choice in this matter
column9: В таком случае лучший выбор - Эрик Блэр

column2: I have total confidence in the abilities of Tom Mann
column9: Я полностью уверен в способностях Тома Манна

column2: Amend the law and merge the offices of Chairman and General Secretary
column9: Совместить должности председателя и генерального секретаря
