Arthur Horner would make a much better general secretary
column9: Артур Хорнер будет лучшим генеральным секретарем

column2: Christabel Pankhurst will improve women's rights all over Britain!
column9: Кристабель Пэнкхерст защитит права женщин Британии!

column2: I have total confidence in the abilities of Tom Mann
column9: Я полностью уверен в способностях Тома Манна

column2: Amend the law and merge the offices of Chairman and General Secretary
column9: Совместить должности председателя и генерального секретаря

column2: The office of general secretary

Niclas y Glais has become the new chairman of the Congress of Trade Unions. This is seen by many as the start of a new age in British politics, and many people are urging Glais to remove Arthur Horner in order to remove the last remains of the old system of government.
Lewis Jones would make a much better general secretary
column9: Льюис Джонс будет лучшим генеральным секретарем

column2: I must compromise with the Maximists
I have total confidence in the abilities of Tom Mann
column9: Я полностью уверен в способностях Тома Манна

column2: Amend the law and merge the offices of Chairman and General Secretary
column9: Совместить должности председателя и генерального секретаря

column2: The Congress of the Trade Unions
The TUC Congress of 1936 begins! How exciting!
1936 TUC Congress - Economic Policy

On this fifth day of the TUC congress, the debate has wandered into the area of economics. As has been predicted, every faction has put forward their own suggestions. Most people assume that the Maximists will win this debate, since Oswald Mosley is a major figure in the British economy these days.
Max.: The economy must be expanded, centralized and effectivized
column9: Экономика должна быть расширена и централизована (максимисты)

column2: Aut.: Greater economic autonomy must be given to the Home Nations
column9: Домашним нациям должна быть предоставлена большая автономия (автономисты)

column2: Fed.: The economy must be slowly expanded, but in line with the current system
column9: Экономика должна развиваться в соответствии с существующей системой (федератисты)

column2: Con.: The economy must be expanded and centralized in order to maintain equality for all
1936 TUC Congress - Internal Policy

On this tenth day of the TUC congress, the debate has wandered into the area of internal policy. As has been predicted, every faction has put forward their own suggestions. Noone is really sure who will triumph in this debate. Will the decentralization message of the Autonomists take the day or will the Maximist centralization message trounce the opposition? Or will perhaps the more vague arguments by Federationists and Congregationalists emerge victorious?
Max.: The local governmenents must be brought in line with the TUC
Aut.: Decentralization is in order - perhaps even local TUC's for the Home Nations
F&C: Don't we all think that the current system is satisfactory for all our people?
1936 TUC Congress - Military Affairs

On this fifteenth day of the TUC congress, the debate has wandered into the area of military affairs. As has been predicted, every faction has put forward their own suggestions. The debate is heated, since the last few days have only too clearly shown the deep rift within the TUC.
Max.: The military must be expanded and the local militias placed under TUC control
Aut.: A Scottish, English and Welsh national army is the only viable option
Fed.: Though the army must be expanded,but slowly and only in self-defence
Con.: Women should be allowed to serve actively in an army
column9: Убрать все ограничения на службу женщин в армии (кон.)

column2: How women should be able to serve?
We must now decide the exact extent for how women can serve their homeland in the British armed forces.
column9: Мы должны точно определить степень участия женщин в наших вооруженных силах.

column2: They can serve the same way the men do
column9: Они будут служить наравне с мужчинами

column2: We allow only volunteer service
1936 TUC Congress - Foreign Policy

On this twentieth day of the TUC congress, the debate has wandered into the area of foreign policy. As has been predicted, every faction has put forward their own suggestions. The Congress listened casually to every candidate until the suggestion of the Autonomists were heard, when a slow, shocked murmur ran through the hall.
Max.: We must fight the reactionaries wherever we find them
column9: Мы должны бороться с реакционерами везде, где найдем их (макс.)

column2: Aut.: We must take a reconcialitory position towards the Royalists
column9: Мы должны попытаться достичь мира с роялистами (авт.)

column2: Fed.: Canada is our mortal enemy, and France is our good friend
Con.: Conflict must be avoided, so that equality can be peacefully built
Philip Snowden Announces his Resignation
column9: Филип Сноуден объявляет о своей отставке

column2: At the last day of the TUC congress, Chairman Philip Snowden climbed up to the podium and made a speech. He claimed that in face of massive rifts within the TUC and his age, he intends to resign his post. He also pulled out the cliche 'time with the family' bit that all politicans do. The congregation stood silent as he climbed down from the podium and made his way out of the hall. The country is shocked, and in a few days' time, the TUC will have to vote on a new chairman.
Shocking, to say the least
Chairman Election - Maximists Secure a Majority
The TUC has decided to vote for Oswald Mosley's Maximists with an overwhelming majority. Oswald Mosley will become the new Chairman of the TUC.
column9: Подавляющее большинство КПС проголосовало за максимистов Освальда Мосли. Он станет новым председателем Конгресса профсоюзов.

column2: Congratulations, Comrade Mosley
Chairman Election - Autonomists Secure a Majority
The TUC has decided to vote for Niclas y Glais' Autonomists with an overwhelming majority. Niclas y Glais will become the new Chairman of the TUC.
column9: Подавляющее большинство КПС проголосовало за автономистов Никласа и Глайса. Он станет новым председателем Конгресса профсоюзов.

column2: Congratulations, Comrade Glais
Chairman Election - Federationists Secure a Majority
The TUC has decided to vote for Arthur Horner's Federationists with an overwhelming majority. Arthur Horner will become the new Chairman of the TUC.
column9: Подавляющее большинство КПС проголосовало за федератистов Артура Хорнера. Он станет новым председателем Конгресса профсоюзов.

column2: Congratulations, Comrade Horner
Chairman Election - Congregationalists Secure a Majority
The TUC has decided to vote for Annie Kenney's Congregationalists with an overwhelming majority. Annie Kenney will become the new Chairwoman of the TUC.
column9: Подавляющее большинство КПС проголосовало за конгрегационалистов Анни Кенни. Она станет новым председателем Конгресса профсоюзов.

column2: Congratulations, Comrade Kenney
Chairman Election - Maximists Win
The TUC has decided to vote for Oswald Mosley's Maximists - but not with any great majority. Oswald Mosley will become the new Chairman of the TUC, but he will have to compromise with other factions.
column9: С небольшим перевесом победили максимисты Освальда Мосли. Он станет новым председателем КПС, но ему придется пойти на компромисс с другими фракциями.

column2: Congratulations, Comrade Mosley
Chairman Election - Autonomists Win

The TUC has decided to vote for Niclas y Glais' Autonomists - but not with any great majority. Niclas y Glais will become the new Chairman of the TUC, but he will have to compromise with other factions.
column9: С небольшим перевесом победили автономисты Никласа и Глайса. Он станет новым председателем КПС, но ему придется пойти на компромисс с другими фракциями.

column2: Congratulations, Comrade Glais
Chairman Election - Federationists Win

The TUC has decided to vote for Arthur Horner's Federationists - but not with any great majority. Arthur Horner will become the new Chairman of the TUC, but he will have to compromise with other factions.
column9: С небольшим перевесом победили федератисты Артура Хорнера. Он станет новым председателем КПС, но ему придется пойти на компромисс с другими фракциями.

column2: Congratulations, Comrade Horner
Chairman Election - Congregationalists Win

The TUC has decided to vote for Annie Kenney's Congregationalists - but not with any great majority. Annie Kenney will become the new Chairwoman of the TUC, but she will have to compromise with other factions.
column9: С небольшим перевесом победили конгрегационалисты Анни Кенни. Она станет новым председателем КПС, но ей придется пойти на компромисс с другими фракциями.

column2: Congratulations, Comrade Kenney
Chairman Election - Draw
The TUC has voted repeatedly during the last few days, and the deadlock continues. What should be done?
column9: КПС заседал несколько дней, но так и не определился с новым председателем. Что нам теперь делать?

column2: The congress elects the General Secretary Tom Mann
column9: Конгресс избирает генерального секретаря Тома Манна

column2: Until next year, there shall be no Chairman
column9: Председатель будет избран в следующем году

column2: Autonomy to the Home Nations
Niclas Y Glais and his Autonomists have argued for a long time that more autonomy must be give the the British home Nations
column3: England, Scotland, and Wales. With the Autonomist in control of the Union's government, this plan can finally come to fruition.
column9: Никлас и Глайс и автономисты в течение долгого времени утверждали, что британским Домашним нациям: Англии, Шотландии и Уэльсу, - должно быть предоставлено больше автономии. Так как автономисты получили контроль над правительством, этот план может осуществиться.

column2: Strong regions are the key to form a strong Union!
column9: Сильные регионы - ключ к сильному Союзу!

column2: The current extend of decentralisation is sufficient. We won't weaken the Union!
column9: Данная степень децентрализации достаточна. Мы не будем ослаблять Союз!

column2: Call an Extraordinary Congress of the Trade Unions?
We have almost driven the Kaiser and his reactionaries from Europe! Now is the perfect time for a Congress of the Trade Unions to be called, to rebuild our tired nation.
column9: Мы почти изгнали кайзера и его реакционеров из Европы! Теперь самое время созвать Конгресс профсоюзов, чтобы обсудить восстановление страны.

column2: Now is the perfect time to reorganise the government
column9: Теперь самое время для реорганизации правительства

column2: The current government is doing a splendid job
column9: Текущее правительство прекрасно справляется с работой

column2: The Economy

Our economy was enlarged during the German war and in the time leading up to it. The decision facing Congress now is whether to expand it further or shrink it back to gain more money to relieve our worst-bombed areas.
column9: Наша экономика серьезно увеличилась во время войны с Германией и во время подготовки к ней. Конгрессу необходимо решить, будет ли она расширяться дальше или вернуть ее к изначальному состоянию, чтобы получить больше денег, для восстановления наших наиболее пострадавших областей.

column2: Onwards, British industry! Build, build, build!
column9: Вперед, британская промышленность! Стройте, стройте, стройте!

column2: We must gain money to aid our deprived citizens
column9: Мы должны получить деньги, чтобы помочь нашим обездоленным гражданам

column2: The status quo is fine
The office of the Exchequer

This is a perfect opportunity to review our leaders. The Chairman has called for elections in all major posts. First comes the important role of Commissary for the Exchequer. Many candidates put themselves forward, each with different arguments for where the Union should go with her industry.
Clem Attlee, to build a new Jerusalem for British Socialism
column9: Клемент Эттли, построим новый Иерусалим для британского социализма

column2: Nye Bevan, to take advantage of our great resources
column9: Эньюрин Бивен, воспользуемся нашими большими ресурсами

column2: Barbara Castle, to protect Britain's families from poverty
column9: Барбара Касл, защитим британские семьи от бедности

column2: The current Commissary is doing a fine job
column9: Нынешний комиссар прекрасно справляется с работой

column2: The office of Commissary for Foreign Affairs
The Chair has now called on the Congress to elect its Commissary for Foreign Affairs.
column9: Теперь председатель обратился к Конгрессу с просьбой избрать комиссара иностранных дел.

column2: Ernest Bevin, to take an uncompromising stance against our adversaries
column9: Эрнест Бевин, займем бескомпромиссную позицию по отношению к нашим противникам

column2: Leslie Solley, to cement relations with the new Europe
column9: Лесли Солли, укрепим отношения с новой Европой

column2: Ian Mikardo will protect British interests above all else
The current Commissary is doing a fine job
column9: Нынешний комиссар прекрасно справляется с работой

column2: The office of Commissary for the Home Department
The Chair has now called on the Congress to elect its Commissary for the Home Department.
column9: Теперь председатель обратился к Конгрессу с просьбой выбрать комиссара внутренних дел.

column2: Herbert Morrison is a man the people trust
column9: Герберт Моррисон  - человек, которому доверяют люди

column2: William Joyce will crush dissent and our enemies!
The current Commissary is doing a fine job
column9: Нынешний комиссар прекрасно справляется с работой

column2: The office of Commissary for Military Intelligence
The Chair has now called on the Congress to elect its Commissary for the Home Department.
column9: Теперь председатель обратился к Конгрессу с просьбой выбрать комиссара внутренних дел.

column2: Ian Fleming is an eccentric enigma, but a genius nonetheless
column9: Ян Флеминг - эксцентричный, но без сомнения гений

column2: Anthony Blunt will root out double agents!
The current Commissary is doing a fine job
column9: Нынешний комиссар прекрасно справляется с работой

column2: Time for a change in leadership?

Comrade Mosley saluted the Congress on their wise decisions so far. Maximism has led us well through this war and is still popular - but the people may be growing tired of authoritarianism, and elements in the Maximists and the Congregationalists are seeking to propose a new liberal way forward.
Mosley and his protege Jack Jones win the top jobs! Maximism triumphs again!
column9: Мосли и его протеже Джек Джонс получают ключевые посты! Максимизм вновь одерживает победу!

column2: Maximist liberals Eric Blair and Phil Piratin defeat Mosley!
column9: Максимистские либералы Эрик Блэр и Филип Пайретин побеждают Мосли!

column2: Shock! Annie Kenney and Barbara Castle win a landslide!
column9: Шок! Анни Кенни и Барбара Касл одерживают внушительную победу!

column2: Chairman-for-Life! Abolish the constitution and rule by decree
Time for a change in leadership?

Comrade Kenney has shown mettle like that of Elizabeth I as she led us reluctantly through this war. Today, however, she looks tired and unlikely to win re-election. Perhaps she can, though, if she looks to more unconventional allies...
column9: Товарищ Кенни показала характер Елизаветы I, когда она привела нас к победе в этой войне. Сегодня, однако, она выглядит усталой и маловероятно, что ее переизберут. Тем не менее это возможно, если она найдет союзников...

column2: The Maximist Mosley and his protege Jack Jones win the top jobs
column9: Максимист Мосли и его протеже Джек Джонс получают ключевые посты

column2: Kenney turns to Maximist Clem Attlee for support and wins!
column9: Кенни обращается к максимисту Клементу Эттли за поддержкой и побеждает!

column2: Barbara Castle challenges the Congregationalist consensus and succeeds
column9: Барбара Кастл бросает вызов конгрегационалистскому согласию и преуспевает

column2: Enough of this closet pacifism! The military seizes control
column9: Достаточно этого скрытого пацифизма! Армия захватывает власть

column2: Time for a change in leadership?

It has been many years since Chairman Glaise oversaw the de-federalisation of our Union and the autonomy of Wales and Scotland. Now, in the aftermath of the European war, we must decide whether he deserves to keep the job.
The Maximist Mosley and his protege Jack Jones win the top jobs
column9: Максимист Мосли и его протеже Джек Джонс получают ключевые посты

column2: william Gallacher and J.B. Priestley will speak for England and Scotland
column9: Уильям Галлахер и Джон Бойнтон Пристли будут говорить за Англию и Шотландию

column2: y Glais appeals to Bevan's Welsh background and holds on to power
column9: Глайс обращается к валлийскому происхождению Бивена и удерживает власть

column2: Enough of this weakness and decentralisation! The military seizes control
column9: Достаточно слабости и децентрализации! Армия захватывает власть

column2: Partial independence to the Home Nations ?
Autonomists have argued for a long time that more autonomy must be give the the British home Nations
column3: England, Scotland, and Wales. With the Autonomist once again in control of the Union's government, they can continue with their plans to grant even more autonomy to Wales and Scotland.

column2: Strong regions are the key to form a strong Union!
column9: Сильные регионы - ключ к сильному Союзу!

column2: The current extend of decentralisation is sufficient. We won't weaken the Union!
column9: Данная степень децентрализации достаточна. Мы не будем ослаблять Союз!

column2: Scottish home nation
...Nobody sees this...
For Scotland and the Union!
Welsh home nation
...Nobody sees this...
Wales will prove it's worth to the Union of Britain!
Time for a change in leadership?

Comrade Horner saluted the Congress on their wise decisions so far. Federationism has led us well through this war and is still popular - but Oswald Mosley is challenging him for the Chair, as is the up-and-coming Congregationalist Barbara Castle. Federationists may have to rely on an old ally to win the day...
Horner elevates G.D.H. Cole to General Secretary and narrowly wins
column9: Хорнер продвигает Дж.Д.Х. Коула на пост генерального секретаря

column2: Horner stands aside in favour of Clem Attlee and G.D.H. Cole
column9: Хорнер отказывается от борьбы в пользу Клемента Эттли и Дж.Д.Х. Коула

column2: Mosley and Blair win the Chair and General Secretariat!
column9: Мосли и Блэр получают посты председателя и генерального секретаря!

column2: Barbara Castle and James Maxton make a pact and win their posts
column9: Барбара Касл и Джеймс Мэкстон заключают союз и получают посты

column2: A Cold, Wet Day for Eric Blair

Comrade Eric Blair, once an ally of Chairman-for-life Mosley, cannot stand it any longer. For too long the evil Mosley has perverted the constitution and made the Union of Britain his plaything. A popular writer and skilled militia commander, Blair alone has the authority to bring down the tyrant. As Blair stares out into the rain today, he knows he must take action.
Blair leads a successful populist coup!
Mosley sniffs out the coup and executes Blair!
column9: Мосли пронюхивает о перевороте и казнит Блэра!

column2: Blair cannot handle this on his own - bring in the military!
column9: Блэр не может справится сам, армия осуществляет переворот!

column2: Blair cannot bring himself to do it and commits suicide
column9: Блэр не может ничего сделать и совершает самоубийство

column2: What now?

Interim Chairman Lawrence has never been comfortable ruling a socialist nation such as ours. A good man and loyal Briton at heart, he was more at home agitating foreign peoples than overseeing five-year plans. Comrade Wintringham approaches him and asks if he will allow a Congress to meet this month and establish a new civilian government... or maybe he has other ideas.
Civilians? Pah! Though this socialism thing is growing on me
column9: Гражданские? Ха! Этот социализм мне все больше нравится

column2: Lawrence is secretly a Monarchist and launches a counter-revolution!
column9: Лоуренс - тайный монархист и начинает контрреволюцию!

column2: A Congress is held and the Federationists secure a majority!
column9: Конгресс проведен, и федератисты сохраняют большинство!

column2: A Congress is held and the Congregationalists and Autonomists form a pact!
column9: Конгресс проведен, конгрегационалисты и автономисты заключают союз!

column2: We have risen against the Syndicalists!
...no-one will see this...
For King and Country!
The Royalists have risen against us!

The entire Western region of England, as well as Wales, has defected to the Royalist cause! 'Chairman' Lawrence, the filthy traitor, must have been building a network of underground support there for months. Not to worry! We will drive them into the Atlantic yet.
We will wipe them out, in the Union's name!
column9: Мы уничтожим их, во имя Союза!

column2: Exile reinforcements arrive!
Our exiled Royalist brothers, bloodied and beaten from the defeat of Canada have nevertheless sent some troop ships to our ports, bringing with them troops ready to fight the Syndicalist menace.
column9: Наши изгнанные роялистские братья, обескровленные поражением Канады, все же прислали военные транспорты, с войсками, готовыми сражаться с синдикалистской угрозой.

column2: We'll get to London yet!
Canadian reinforcements arrive!
Our exiled Royalist brothers, fresh from Canada's barracks have sent troop ships to our ports, bringing with them thousands of troops ready to fight the Syndicalist menace.
column9: Наши изгнанные роялистские братья, только что прислали военные транспорты, с тысячами солдат на борту, готовых сражаться с синдикалистской угрозой.

column2: We'll get to London yet!
VICTORY!

The Union of Britain's leaders are fleeing our victorious troops today as they march through the streets of all Britain's major cities. It has been a hard fight, but a Union weary of war has fallen before our Royal might. The United Kingdom has prevailed once again!
God save the King!
VICTORY!

The United Kingdom's leaders are fleeing our victorious troops today as they march through the streets of all Britain's major cities. It has been a hard fight, but a Union weary of war has triumphed over reaction and royalty once again. Another victory for the Union and her workers!
Death to the United Kingdom!
Who can rebuild Britain?

Chairman Bevan, with Comrade Wintringham at his side, has successfully led us through a difficult and violent Civil War. In the interests of upholding the power of the people of the Union, he has now called an extraordinary contest to determine who shall rule the Union, declaring he will, if allowed, align with any faction that gains the most support.
It is time for a heavy dose of Maximism - Phil Piratin and Jack Jones!
column9: Настало время для большой дозы максимизма - Филип Пайретин и Джек Джонс!

column2: We have seen what war does - Congregationalists Kenney and Castle
column9: Мы видели то, что делает война - конгрегационалисты Кенни и Касл

column2: Eric Blair and Bevan shall lead a government of compromise!
column9: Эрик Блэр и Бивен должны возглавить коаллиционное правительство!

column2: Provisional, schmovisional. Keep the current government
What do do with the Royalists?

After the shock realisation that the traitor Lawrence was able to build support for the Royalist rebellion among so many in the west of the country, we should take action to punish those who rose against us. Alternately, we could launch a new propaganda programme to promote the value of the Union's continued existence.
The traitors will be imprisoned for life
The traitors will each be made to join an industrial collective and work
column9: Все предатели должны присоединиться к рабочему коллективу и работать

column2: The only response to treason is death!
We should promote our existing system instead
T.E. Lawrence offers his services

Veteran agitator and aid to the Arab Revolt in the Great War T.E. Lawrence has kept a low profile in the Union so far. However, three years ago he narrowly avoided death in a motorcycle accident that ended years of aimless wandering through life. Today he approached Army High Command and offered to train as an agitator to help European Syndicalists rise up during the eventual war with Germany.
Lawrence shall be valuable in spreading the revolution
column9: Лоуренс может быть полезен в деле распространения революции

column2: We don't trust him - where are his Socialist credentials?
column9: Мы не доверяем ему - он не настоящий социалист

column2: Lawrence establishes the RED

T.E. Lawrence, a year into his new commission in the Army, has established a new secret operations organisation aimed at sending men behind German lines during the inevitable European war and raising revolt, called the Revolutionary Exportation Directory. Full of French, German and Italian-speaking soldiers and ideologues, the teams are trained in parachuting at night and will be a valuable asset to the Syndicalist cause.
Excellent, carry on
Send Lawrence to Germany?

T.E. Lawrence has asked permission to be air-dropped behind German lines and rendezvous with Syndicalist leaders in the Rhine and Saarland regions of Germany to raise raiding parties and potentially a revolt.
column9: T.Э. Лоуренс попросил разрешения о высадке с самолета позади немецкой границы и встречи с синдикалистскими лидерами Рейнских и Саарских областей Германии, чтобы подготовить диверсионные группы и потенциальное восстание.

column2: Good luck, Lawrence of Germania!
We cannot spare the funds
T.E. Lawrence is back and raising hell!
column9: T.Э. Лоуренс вернулся и поднял шум!

column2: Our commanders in the Rhine and Saarland regions indicate that the former scourge of the Ottomans, T.E. Lawrence, along with other agitators and agents, is travelling through the countryside and working with local underground Syndicalist movements to sabotage elements of German industry! They must be stopped at once!
Damn you, Lawrence of Germania!
T.E. Lawrence has moved north!

That damned T.E. Lawrence is continuing to cause trouble, growing bolder as he moves his band of reds (who are blending in with the civilian population irritatingly well) into our northern industrial cities. He cannot be allowed to carry on!
column9: Проклятый T.Э. Лоуренс продолжает доставлять неприятности, обретя уверенность, он со своей красной бандой (которая смешивается с гражданскими и вызывает среди них волнения) отправился в наши северные индустриальные города. Его необходимо остановить!

column2: Damn you, Lawrence of Germania!
T.E. Lawrence has moved east!

That damned T.E. Lawrence is continuing to cause trouble, growing bolder as he moves his band of reds (who are blending in with the civilian population irritatingly well) into our central industrial cities. The chief of the Reich's security services has promised the Kaiser this will be the last time he and his 'merry men' can wreak havoc in this way, having set a trap for him in Dresden.
Damn you, Lawrence of Germania!
T.E. Lawrence has barely escaped with his life!

The vicious Germans laid a trap for our brave Comrade Lawrence while he and local Syndicalist fighters like Bertholt Brecht set bombs in a factory in Dresden. While Lawrence managed to escape to the coast where a French submarine was able to take him safely back to Britain, he was shot in the leg and can no longer walk without a cane. His time as an agitator is over, but his time as a national hero has only just begun.
Hoorah for Lawrence of Germania!
Lawrence got away... barely

The troublemaker Lawrence fell for our trap in Dresden but managed to shoot his way out. We believe one of our Landsers managed to land a rifle round in his leg as he escaped, but other than that we believe he was successfully extracted a few days later from Stettin by a French submarine. We might not have killed him, but he certainly will not trouble us again.
Good
General Secretary Maxton passes away

The General Secretary, James Maxton, has died after a lifetime serving the workers of Britain, especially Scotland. Even as Britain mourns this immeasurable loss, the Chairman of the TUC must appoint a successor to the late Comrade Maxton.
column9: Генеральный секретарь, Джеймс Мэкстон, умер, прожив жизнь служа рабочим Британии и особенно Шотландии. Как раз тогда, когда Британия оплакивает эту неизмеримую потерю, председатель Конгресса профсоюзов должен назначить преемника.

column2: G.D.H. Cole will continue Maxton's behind the scenes work
Christabel Pankhurst! It's time for more women in the top jobs
column9: Кристабель Пэнкхерст! Время для увеличения числа женщин на ключевых должностях

column2: Nye Bevan will build a worker's paradise in Maxton's honour
column9: Эньюрин Бивен построит рай для рабочих в честь Мэкстона

column2: Harry Pollitt will keep the Unions happy
General Secretary Blair passes away

The General Secretary, Eric Blair, has died after a lifetime serving the workers of Britain. Even as Britain mourns this immeasurable loss, the Chairman of the TUC must appoint a successor to the late Comrade Blair.
column9: Генеральный секретарь, Эрик Блэр, умер, прожив жизнь служа рабочим Британии и особенно Шотландии. Как раз тогда, когда Британия оплакивает эту неизмеримую потерю, председатель Конгресса профсоюзов должен назначить преемника.

column2: G.D.H. Cole will continue Blair's behind the scenes work
Phil Piratin! It is time for a more liberal Maximist voice
column9: Филип Пайретин! Время для либеральных максимистов

column2: Nye Bevan will build a worker's paradise in Blair's honour
column9: Эньюрин Бивен построит рай для рабочих в честь Блэра

column2: Harry Pollitt will keep the Unions happy
General Secretary Cole passes away

The General Secretary, G.D.H. Cole, has died after a lifetime serving the workers of Britain. Even as Britain mourns this immeasurable loss, the Chairman of the TUC must appoint a successor to the late Comrade Cole.
column9: Генеральный секретарь, Дж.Д.Х. Коул, умер, прожив жизнь служа рабочим Британии и особенно Шотландии. Как раз тогда, когда Британия оплакивает эту неизмеримую потерю, председатель Конгресса профсоюзов должен назначить преемника.

column2: Barbara Castle will continue Cole's behind the scenes work
Phil Piratin! It is time for a liberal Maximist voice
column9: Филип Пайретин! Время для либеральных максимистов

column2: Denis Healey will get the most out of Britain
column9: Денис Хили принесет наибольшую выгоду Британии

column2: Dockers' leader Jim Callaghan makes a strong case for decentralisation
column9: Лидер докеров, Джим Каллаган, приводит веские аргументы в пользу децентрализации

column2: General Secretary Bevan passes away

The General Secretary, Nye Bevan, has died after a lifetime serving the workers of Britain. Even as Britain mourns this immeasurable loss, the Chairman of the TUC must appoint a successor to the late Comrade Bevan.
column9: Генеральный секретарь, Эньюрин Бивен, умер, прожив жизнь служа рабочим Британии. Как раз когда Британия оплакивает эту неизмеримую потерю, председатель Конгресса профсоюзов должен назначить преемника.

column2: Barbara Castle will continue Bevan's social work
Phil Piratin! It is time for a liberal Maximist voice
column9: Филип Пайретин! Время для либеральных максимистов

column2: Tony Benn, up and coming son of William, gets his chance
column9: Тони Бенн, сын Уильяма, получил шанс

column2: Dockers' leader Jim Callaghan makes a strong case for decentralisation
column9: Лидер докеров, Джим Каллаган, приводит веские аргументы в пользу децентрализации

column2: Chairman Bevan passes away
The Chairman of the TUC, Nye Bevan, has died after a lifetime serving the workers of Britain. Even as Britain mourns this immeasurable loss, the TUC must elect a successor to the late Comrade Bevan.
column9: Председатель Конгресса профсоюзов, Эньюрин Бивен, умер, прожив жизнь служа рабочим Британии. Как раз когда Британия оплакивает эту неизмеримую потерю, Конгресс профсоюзов должен назначить преемника.

column2: Barbara Castle will continue Bevan's social work
Rising star Harold Wilson makes his move
column9: Восходящая звезда, Гарольд Уилсон, делает свой ход

column2: Clem Attlee finally takes over
Jack Jones will lead British Trade Unions to prosperity!
column9: Джек Джонс приведет британские профсоюзы к процветанию!

column2: General Secretary Pankhurst passes away

The General Secretary, Christabel Pankhurst, has died after a lifetime serving the workers of Britain. Even as Britain mourns this immeasurable loss, the Chairman of the TUC must appoint a successor to the late Comrade Pankhurst.
column9: Генеральный секретарь, Кристабель Пэнкхерст, умерла, прожив жизнь служа рабочим Британии. Как раз когда Британия оплакивает эту неизмеримую потерю, председатель Конгресса профсоюзов должен назначить преемника.

column2: Barbara Castle will continue Bevan's social work
Phil Piratin! It is time for a liberal Maximist voice
column9: Филип Пайретин! Время для либеральных максимистов

column2: Tony Benn, up and coming son of William, gets his chance
column9: Тони Бенн, сын Уильяма, получил шанс

column2: Dockers' leader Jim Callaghan makes a strong case for decentralisation
column9: Лидер докеров, Джим Каллаган, приводит веские аргументы в пользу децентрализации

column2: Chairman Mann passes away

Britain's ever-faithful servant and current Chairman of the Congress of Trade Unions Tom Mann has died in his sleep. A Revolutionary of the old guard, Mann spent his life serving the people of Britain and will be sorely missed. On a wave of sympathy with Mann's own Federationist faction, Arthur Horner has been elected to replace him, with Federationist stalwart Harry Pollitt assuming the post of General Secretary.
You will be missed, comrade
column9: Нам будет не хватать вас, товарищ

column2: A New 1066
Enemies of Syndicalism have gained a foothold on our island! The nation must fully mobilize in order to stop them!...
column9: Враги синдикализма получили плацдарм на нашем острове! Чтобы остановить их страна должна мобилизовать все свои силы.

column2: To arms ,comrades!

We have been preparing for The Third International since 1927. Now, we are nearly ready to hold the First Congress right here on Montmartre Hill in Paris, built on the ruins of Sacrй-Coeur. For three days, the city will host delegates from almost every Socialist, Syndicalist, and Bolshevik party from all across the World. We, The French will take the floor first, that is if we are still planning on hosting the First Congress and contiuning the work of the Second International.
The Congress Will Be Held a week after May Day as planned!
column9: Конгресс пройдет через неделю после Первого мая, как и запланировано!

column2: Cancel the Congress, what a blunder!
Our only priority is Syndicalism in France and nowhere else
column9: Наша основная задача - синдикализм во Франции

column2: The First Congress of the Third International
It is time to invite the Socialist and Syndicalist leaders who will be coming from all around the Globe to attend the First Congress of the Third International.
column9: Пора пригласить лидеров социалистов и синдикалистов  со всех концов света на I конгресс Третьего Интернационала.

column2: Send out the invitations!
The Third International
France has gone through with its designs to hold the First Congress of the Third International and we, as expected, have received an invitation. It would be foolish not to send a delegation.
column9: Франция завершила подготовку к проведению I конгресса Третьего Интернационала и мы, как и ожидалось, получили приглашение. Было бы глупо не послать делегацию.

column2: Arthur Horner will attend on behalf of the Union of Britain
column9: Артур Хорнер будет представлять Британский Союз

column2: Tell the French we can't make it, we're uh...
column9: Скажите французам, что мы не можем, мы мм...

column2: Our only priority is Socialism in Britain and nowhere else
column9: Наш главная задача - социализм в Британии

column2: The Third International
France has gone through with its designs to hold the First Congress of the Third International and we, as expected, have received an invitation. It would be foolish not to send a delegation.
column9: Франция завершила подготовку к проведению I конгресса Третьего Интернационала и мы, как и ожидалось, получили приглашение. Было бы глупо не послать делегацию.

column2: Better start packing!
Its a long way from Napoli to Paris...
column9: Дорога из Неаполя в Париж слишком длинна...

column2: The Third International
France has gone through with its designs to hold the First Congress of the Third International and we, as expected, have received an invitation. It would be foolish not to send a delegation.
column9: Франция завершила подготовку к проведению I конгресса Третьего Интернационала и мы, как и ожидалось, получили приглашение. Было бы глупо не послать делегацию.

column2: Send a delegate!
If the French aren't paying for Fuel...
The Third International

France has gone through with its designs to hold the First Congress of the Third International and we, as expected, have received an invitation. It would be foolish not to send a delegation, no matter how far apart the Bhartiya Commune and France are.
column9: Франция завершила подготовку к проведению I конгресса Третьего Интернационала и мы, как и ожидалось, получили приглашение. Было бы глупо не послать делегацию, невзирая на расстояние между Бенгалией и Францией.

column2: We must show them how important India is to spreading Socialism
column9: Мы должны показать им, важность Индии в распространении синдикализма

column2: There are more pressing issues...
The Third International

France has gone through with its designs to hold the First Congress of the Third International and we, as expected, have received an invitation. It would be foolish not to send a delegation. The situation in the Americas is getting worse, and we may need some help from Europe!
Borrow a plane from the USA and get to Paris!
column9: Возьмите самолет у США и доберитесь до Парижа!

column2: Things are still too unstable here in Mexico...
column9: Здесь, в Мексике, все так непостоянно...

column2: The Third International

France has gone through with its designs to hold the First Congress of the Third International and we, as expected, have received an invitation. It would be foolish not to send a delegation. We may help Socialism grow in Norway, which is still uneasy with the people.
To Paris!
We're still new to this stuff...
column9: Для нас это все еще ново...

column2: The Third International
France has gone through with its designs to hold the First Congress of the Third International and we, as expected, have received an invitation. It would be foolish not to send a delegation.
column9: Франция завершила подготовку к проведению I конгресса Третьего Интернационала и мы, как и ожидалось, получили приглашение. Было бы глупо не послать делегацию.

column2: We'd be mad to miss this!
column9: Нужно быть безумцем, чтобы пропустить его!

column2: Ukraine shall have no part in this so called 'Congress'
column9: Украина не должна иметь ничего общего с этим 'Конгрессом'

column2: The Third International

France has gone through with its designs to hold the First Congress of the Third International and we, as expected, have received an invitation. It would be foolish not to send a delegation. The situation in the Americas is getting worse, and we may need some help from Europe in stabilizing the United States!
Expect the USA to send someone
The people aren't ready...
The Third International
France has gone through with its designs to hold the First Congress of the Third International and we, as expected, have received an invitation. It would be foolish not to send a delegation.

The State of Indian Socialism

As the congress approaches its end, young Jawaharlal Nehru takes the floor to explain the precarious state of our revolutionary government. In his speech he strongly called for international support in building a people's army to rival our enemies in Delhi and Hyderabad.
We need international support in organizing our army!

Comrade Blair's book is published

Eric Arthur Blair's long-awaited vision of the future, entitled 'The Union in Forty Years', is finally running off the national presses. In it, Comrade Blair offers an inspiring vision of how far the Union of Britain will have come by 1984, describing a period of peace and prosperity for workers not only within our island, but across the world. The book will serve as a much-needed boost to morale in these trying times, and has been distributed to all members of the armed forces and the national workforce.
An excellent read!
The John Maclean takes off for France

The John Maclean, named after the first president of the Union of Britain, was the largest airship ever built. She was constructed in 1935 as a propaganda tool, intended to show the world the achievements of the Union of Britain. In 1936, she made her maiden voyage, and soon started making regular traffic to Paris. In May 1937, it was time once again, 97 people were on board.
Upwards, for the glory of socialism and the Union of Britan!
column9: Ввысь, во славу социализма и Британского Союза!

column2: The John Maclean Explodes!

The John Maclean, named after the first president of the Union of Britain, was the largest airship ever built. She was constructed in 1935 as a propaganda tool, intended to show the world the achievements of the Union of Britain. In 1936, she made her maiden voyage, and soon started making regular traffic to Paris. Today, as she was about to dock at a Paris airfield, she burst into flames and crashed to the ground. 35 people out of 97 (plus one of the groundcrew) died.
A Tragedy!
The John Maclean Explodes!
The John Maclean has exploded upon arriving in Paris. 36 people have died, this accident is a massive blow to national pride and morale! The Union goes into a state of mourning.
column9: Джон Маклин взорвался после прибытия в Париж. 36 человек погибли, этот несчастный случай - крупный удар по национальной гордости и духу! В Союзе объявлен траур.

Labour Day

Today, all around the world, Democratic, Socialist, and Syndicalist governments are celebrating International Workers' Day, Labour Day, or May Day. May Day has become an international celebration of the social and economic achievements of the working class and labour movement and is celebrated widely throughout the Commune of France.
Celebrate!
The First Bourges International Art Festival

The First Bourges International Art Festival was held today. The artwork included many famous Syndicalist Realist paintings commisioned by the French Government as well as many British, Russian, and American paintings and a mural painted by Diego Rivera. The event will be lasting into the weekend and has attracted World Wide attention. We will enjoy the spotlight for now.

Luigi Pirandello Dies

Italian writer and dramatist Luigi Pirandello died today in his native town of Agrigento, in Sicily, at the age of 69. He was one of the most known Italian writers, and chose to stay in Sicily after the Revolution, defining himself as an apolitical man. The government gave him state funerals.
Italy will mourn him forever
column9: Италия будет скорбить по нему всегда

column2: Marceau Pivert falls

Despite the successful organization of the Syndicalist Congress on May, the Pivert administration has been criticized for its lack of reaction against the surveying of trade unions in Germany. Today, the opposition in the Bourse Gйnйrale du Travail agreed to a vote of no confidence towards Pivert, who announced that new elections would be brought forward to elect a new Comitй. His duties will be temporary assumed by Comitй de Salut Public until the last results.
Good bye, Camarade Pivert
Election day 1: Clarifying the Communal Army

Due to the presence of trade unions within the Communal Army, this one has became overly politicized, creating tensions within the Guarantor of National Integrity and the Arm of the Syndicalist Revolution! The French Syndicalist military leaders, mostly Sorelians, decided to ask the soldiers who they want to lead the French army, before definitely dissolving the military trade unions.
Paul Le Gentilhomme (Travailleur) - Tank proponent
Jacques Duclos (Jacobin) - Centralized High Command
Jacques Doriot (Sorelian) - Officers' initiative
Henri Rol-Tanguy (Anarchiste) - Mass conscription
column9: Анри Роль-Танги (анархисты) - массовый призыв на воинскую службу

column2: Election day 2: The Renseignements Gйnйraux

Due to its key purpose over external and internal matters, the position of Director of the Comitй de Renseignements Gйnйraux is one of the keys to supreme power over the Commune of France, and for the destruction of political rivals. It could be a terrible weapon in the hands of one of the extremist fractions, Jacobins and Sorelians...
Roger Salengro (Travailleur)
Waldeck Rochet (Jacobin)
Pierre Villon (Sorelian)
Albert Camus (Anarchiste)
Election day 3: The Internal Security

Travailleur Charles Rappoport has resigned his post of Delegate for Internal Security to compete for the Foreign Affairs post. Former Chairman Marceau Pivert, still hoping for his political future, has managed to be endorsed by the Travailleur wing, fighting the stern Jacobin Maurice Thorez, Sorelian General Marcel Bucard, and young Makhno's disciple, Maurice Joyeux.
Marceau Pivert (Travailleur)
Maurice Thorez (Jacobin)
Marcel Bucard (Sorelian)
Maurice Joyeux (Anarchiste)
Election day 4: The Economic Affairs

Today election seems to be a plebiscite about the economic policy of the last years. Many visions of the Syndicalist economy, more or less concentrated on industry or agriculture, are fighting each other, all of them being crucial for the future final struggle against Germany...
Benoоt Frachon (Travailleur) - Orthodox Syndicalism
Jean Jйrфme (Jacobin) - Industrialization
Jacques Doriot (Sorelian) - War economy and agriculture
column9: Жак Дорио (сорелисты) - военная экономика и расширение с.х.

column2: Daniel Guйrin (Anarchiste) - Cooperatives
Election day 5: The Foreign Affairs

With the final election day, one of the leading issues of the Commune of France is raised: diplomacy, which carries the double task of spreading the Revolution throughout the world and preparing for revenge against Germany. If the very existence of the Syndicalist Internationale is not in danger yet, the future theatres of the World Revolution will be defined today...
Charles Rappoport (Travailleur)-Internationalism
Marcel Cachin (Jacobin)-World revolution
Angelo Tasca (Sorelian)-Revenge against Germany
Nestor Makhno (Anarchiste)-Destroying the Entente
The results-Travailleur majority

Even if many saw in this election the end of the Travailleur compromise that had ruled the Commune since the death of Emile Pouget, they managed to secure a firm majority during these elections. Even if Pivert could be recalled at least, which is very unlikely, everybody's looking towards the Russian йmigrй Boris Souverain (born Souvarine) to lead the Commune to its final glory!

The Syndicalist structures has been abolished, all replaced by a single Communist Party, Sorelian partisans are chased, exiled or gunned down. column2: To the victor, the spoils!
Accept Colombia into the Internationale?
Columbia has decided to fully join our struggle against the capitalist oppressors. Shall we accept them as the newest members of the Internationale?
column9: Колумбия решила присоединиться к нашей борьбе против капиталистов. Должны ли мы принять ее в Интернационалл?

column2: Accept
There is no need for an alliance
The Communal elections of 1941

As planned in 1936, the five-year term of the current Comitй de Salut Public comes to an end. It is time to discuss economic and internal policies as well as foreign matters, so that the BGT may elect the new members of the Comitй.
column9: В этом году подошел срок новых выборов в Комитет общественного спасения. Пришло время обсудить нашу внешнюю и внутреннюю политику.

column2: Let's get to work, camarades!
The Communal elections of 1941

As planned in 1936, the five-year term of the current Comitй de Salut Public comes to an end. It is time to discuss economic and internal policies as well as foreign matters, so that the BGT may elect the new members of the Comitй.
column9: В этом году подошел срок новых выборов в Комитет общественного спасения. Пришло время обсудить нашу внешнюю и внутреннюю политику.

column2: There's a war on, we'll do it later!
The elections shall occur as planned
Communal Elections - Internal policy

The major issue regarding internal policy is the reform of the current system and the way we deal with opposition. The Travailleurs support liberalisation and democratisation along the lines of the British system
column3: the Sorelians consider that the current compromise is better and would like to keep an eye on liberal dissent
column4: the Anarchistes favor a more open society but oppose any rightist deviation of the Commune
column5: the Jacobins, finally, demand that the central government is reinforced.
column9: Основной вопрос, касающийся внутренней политики - реформирование существующей системы и способы соглашения с оппозицией. Травайисты предлагают либерализация и демократизация в духе британской системы

column2: Travailleurs : The Revolution Is Over : Liberalise Politics
Sorelians : We Shall Defend The Values of the Commune
Anarchists : Freedom Of Speech For All
Jacobins : Now the Revolution Will Lead The Commune
Communal Elections - Economic policies
It is time to work on the efficiency of the French productive system. The Travailleurs propose to focus our efforts toward research and to give more flexibility to the industrial collectives
column3: the Sorelians oppose any liberalisation but want to improve the agriculture and industrialise the western communes in Britanny and Aquitaine
column4: the Anarchistes still support the cooperatives and desire infrastructure improvement
column5: the Jacobins want to develop a central planning bureau to prepare for war.
column9: Пора работать на эффективность французской производственной системы. Травайисты предлагают сосредоточить наши усилия на исследованиях и дать большую свободу производственным коллективам

column2: Travailleurs : Knowledge and Freedom are Power
Sorelians : Strengthen the West and support the Peasants
column9: Сорелисты - развиите запада и поддержка крестьян

column2: Anarchists : Self-Management Will Lead To Success
Jacobins : Centralisation is a Necessity
Communal Elections - Foreign policies

The Internationale must, of course, be strengthened, but Travailleurs would favor a more cautious approach and further cooperation with our British and Italian friends, while Sorelians still consider Germany and its potential allies the most important threat at hand. The Anarchistes would like to help to revolutionary movements everywhere. The Jacobins advocate a hawkish position against the Entente.
Travailleurs : Peace Will Win Hearts And Minds
column9: Травайисты - мы должны жить в мире

column2: Sorelians : German Imperialism Must Be Destroyed
Anarchists : The World Revolution Starts Here
Jacobins : The red flag must fly above Ottawa, Algiers and Berlin.
column9: Якобинцы - над Оттавой и Алжиром должен развиваться красный флаг

column2: Communal Elections - No majority achieved

With no clear majority after the communal elections, the current compromise Travailleur-Sorelian Comitй de Salut Public will continue the task at hand. However, as a gesture of reconciliation towards the minorities, a collective leadership will be set in place until the next elections.
It can't be helped
Communal Elections - Travailleur majority

The reformist Travailleurs have secured a clear majority for liberalisation and democratisation of the Commune. Camarade Pivert, whose recent reformist positions have been the platform of the successful Travailleur Manifesto, is expected to form the new Comitй, although it has not been made clear whether the current military leaders would change or not.
Congratulations, Camarade Pivert
Communal Elections - Sorelian majority

Back to the roots of the Syndicalist Revolution, the workers have have given the majority to the Sorelians. Camarade Bucard, the most brilliant leader of the orthodox Sorelians, is expected to form the new Comitй, while the new Chairman of the Bourse Gйnйrale du Travail will be Georges Valois, the Grandfather of all Syndicalists. It has not been made clear yet whether the current military leaders would change or not.
Congratulations, Camarade Bucard
Communal Elections - Anarchiste majority

Thanks to the youth, for a democratic Syndicalism, the Commune has given the majority to the Anarchistes. Camarade Guйrin, the energetic and popular leader of the Anarchiste faction, is expected to form the new Comitй, while the new Chairman of the Bourse Gйnйrale du Travail will be Nestor Makhno, the Kosciuszko of Syndicalism. It has not been made clear yet whether the current military leaders would change or not.
Congratulations, Camarade Guerin
Communal Elections - Jacobin majority

In times of great danger for the Proletariat, the Commune has rightfully chosen the Jacobins to lead France towards a glorious future. Jacques Duclos, known as the Red Dwarf, will form the new Comitй while the new Chairman of the Bourse Gйnйrale du Travail will be Marcel Cachin, the long-time chief editor of the Humanitй newspaper. The top military leaders are expected to stay in place.
Congratulations, Camarade Duclos
The Communal elections of 1946

As decided after the last Communal Congress, the term of the current Comitй de Salut Public comes to an end. It is time to discuss economic and internal policies as well as foreign matters, so that the BGT may elect the new members of the Comitй.
column9: В этом году истек срок полномочий Комитета общественного спасения. Пришло время определить нашу внутреннюю, внешнюю и экономическую политики, чтобы ВБТ избрал новых членов Комитета.

column2: Let's get to work, Camarades!
Communal Elections

The major issue is the re-integration in the Commune of former Social-Democrats that left fifteen years ago. The Travailleurs, now the most reformist faction within the CGT, want to continue the democratisation process and push for an open arms policy towards the Social-Democrats. The Anarchistes, although in favor of liberalisation, oppose that policy, as well as the now declining Sorelians. The Jacobins, of course, still advocate a Bolshevik-like reform.
Travailleur majority : We have to make room for our Social-Democratic estranged friends
column9: Травайисты - социал-демократы должны быть представлены в правительстве

column2: Sorelian majority : No decay of the revolutionary values will be tolerated
column9: Сорелисты - мы не можем допустить уничтожения революционных ценностей

column2: Anarchiste majority : Proletarian democracy does not require Social-Democrats
column9: Анархисты - пролетарская демократия не нуждается в социал-демократах

column2: Jacobin majority : The Commune is ready for Bolshevism.
Nestor Makhno retires
Comrade Makhno announced his retirement. Comrade Mayer will become the new leader of the French Anarchists.
column9: Товарищ Махно объвил о своей отставке. Товарищ Майер станет новым лидером французских анархистов.

column2: He will be missed
Nestor Makhno retires
Comrade Makhno announced his retirement and comrade Mayer will become the new leader of the French Anarchists. His duties will be performed by CSP.
column9: Товарищ Махно объвил о своей отставке. Его обязанности будет выполнять Комитет Общественного Спасения. Товарищ Майер станет новым лидером французских анархистов.

column2: He will be missed
The Communal elections of 1951

The term of the current Comitй de Salut Public comes to an end. It is time to discuss economic and internal policies as well as foreign matters, so that the BGT may elect the new members of the Comitй.
column9: В этом году истек срок полномочий Комитета обзественного спасения. Пришло время определить нашу внутреннюю, внешнюю и экономическую политики, чтобы ВБТ избрал новых членов Комитета.

column2: Let's get to work, Camarades!
Communal Elections

Thirty years have passed since Commune of France has been established. Our way to socialism and prosperity was hard and long. We've seen the birth of Totalism, that fortunately didn't get a chance to rule us. Now, when the people choose the new government, our main goal is not only to develop Syndicalism, but also to protect 'des droits de l’homme et du citoyen', such as democracy and the right to happiness.
Travailleur majority - Democratisation of the Commune should be gradual
Sorelian majority - Totalism shall stand triumphant
Anarchiste majority - It's time to introduce more freedom
column9: Анархисты - пришло время принести больше свободы

column2: Jacobin majority - We are true Communards
Mirsa Sultan-Galiev and the International's Muslim Committee
Welcome on board comrade!
Sultan-Galiev and his ideas should be left alone
The Rise of the Socialist Muslim Committee
Declare a Jihad against the International!
Direct extra funds to the secret police!
The Rise of the Socialist Muslim Committee

The Commune of France together with other members of the Syndicalist International has revived the Muslim Committee, informally known as the 'Socialist Muslim Committee'. This body is coordinating the Syndicalist powers' actions in the Middle East. Our intelligence reports show that there is small influx of Egyptian left-wing radicals who want to fight for the revolutionary cause. While we are not at war with the Commune of France or any Syndicalist country, we should be very cautious.
Treason, plots, sabotage!
The Rise of the Socialist Muslim Committee

Commune of France together with other members of the Syndicalist International has revived the Muslim Committee, informally known as the 'Socialist Muslim Committee'. This body is coordinating the Syndicalist powers' actions in the Middle East. Our intelligence reports show that there is small influx of Moroccan left-wing radicals who want to fight for the revolutionary cause. While we are not at war with Commune of France or any Syndicalist country, we should be very cautious.
Are they hiding bombs in their turbans!?
The Rise of the Socialist Muslim Committee

Commune of France together with other members of the Syndicalist International has revived the Muslim Committee, informally known as the 'Socialist Muslim Committee'. This body is coordinating the Syndicalist powers' actions in the Middle East. Our intelligence reports show that there is small influx of Moroccan left-wing radicals who want to fight for the revolutionary cause. While we are not at war with Commune of France or any Syndicalist country, we should be very cautious.
Let's see them try organizing a strike in Mecca!
The Creation of the Socialist Muslim Committee

French Syndicalists have revived the Muslim Committee in the International and have invited us to it. The new Committee will be spreading Socialist propaganda in the Muslim World and coordinate the help to regional left-wing parties. This could be a perfect opportunity to gain the credibility in Muslim circles both in India and abroad. The downside of this Committee is the possibility of galvanizing further religious conflict.
We'll gladly support this idea
Stay out of this
The Creation of the Socialist Muslim Committee

French Syndicalists have revived the Muslim Committee in the International and have invited us to join. The new Committee will be spreading Socialist propaganda in the Muslim World and coordinate assistance to regional left-wing parties. This could be a perfect opportunity to gain credibility in Muslim circles both in Central Asia as well as abroad. The downside of this Committee is the possibility of religious conflict.
We'll gladly support this idea
Stay out of this
Syndicalist Sabotage Act!
One of the Socialist terrorist cells operating in our country has just pulled off a vicious act of sabotage! Thankfully nobody died, but several facilities were destroyed.
They'll pay for this! Those damned Syndies!
Establishment of the Phalanstere Internationale

As time passed it soon became apparent that the global revolution required far more than just devotion to the cause. With France and Britain being the only highly-developed socialist countries in the world, it became widely accepted that they should launch a long-run help programme for other countries. Thus began the so-called 'Phalanstere Internationale', aimed at providing industrial support for socialist countries all over the world.
Establish it
We must not divide our resources
column9: Мы не должны растрачивать наши ресурсы

column2: Italian participation in the Phalanstere Internationale

It is not neccessary
Italian participation in the Phalanstere Internationale

Our Italian comrades have applied to join the Phalanstere Internationale. With the zealous, Habsburg-backed Italian Federation threating Sicilian borders, it is only proper to help our comrades in their struggle. However, we will have to sacrifice a part of our overall industrial power in order to satisfy their needs.
Fine then, begin fulfilling their request
Our industry's already overloaded
Italian participation in the Phalanstere Internationale

Our Italian comrades have applied to join the Phalanstere Internationale. With the zealous, Habsburg-backed Italian Federation threating Sicilian borders, it is only proper to help our comrades in their struggle. However, we will have to sacrifice a part of our overall industrial power in order to satisfy their needs.
Fine then, begin fulfilling their request
Our industry's already overloaded
The Phalanstere has refused to help

Both countries of the Phalanstere have refused to help us in our struggle against the zealous Catholics. Although this borders on treason, we cannot simply defy them - without their support, the Federation is likely to overrun us in no time.
column9: Обе страны Фаланстеров отказали нам в помощи против католиков. Однако, мы не можем отказаться от сотрудничества с ними, поскольку в таком случае Федерация тут же нападет на нас.

column2: We shall remember this
Delivery to Socialist Italy is ready
We have just finished preparing goods and supplies for our Italian comrades. Let us hope it will greatly boost their strength in the upcoming struggle against the reactionaries.
column9: Мы только что закончили подготовку поставки для наших итальянских товарищей. Будем надеяться, что это увеличит их силы для приближающегося столкновения с реакционерами.

column2: Tres bien!

column2: Very well!
The Phalanstere's help arrives

Our comrades have just delivered us the much needed help. Industrial machines, mining equipment, weapons, ammunition and more - all of this is being unloaded in our ports, ready to be implemented across the country.
column9: Наши товарищи только что предоставили нам очень необходимую помощь. Станки, добывающее оборудование, оружие, боеприпасы и многое другое - все это разгружается в наших портах, готовое к использованию нашей страной.

Both countries of the Phalanstere have refused to help us in our struggle against the zealous Catholics and ferocious imperialists. Although this borders on treason, we cannot simply defy them - without their support, the Federation is likely to overrun us in no time.
We shall remember this
Delivery to Bolivia is ready
We have just finished preparing goods and supplies for our Indian comrades. Let us hope it will greatly boost their strength in the upcoming struggle against the reactionaries.

column2: Better than nothing
Brazilian participation in the Phalanstere Internationale

As time passed it soon became apparent that the global revolution required far more than just devotion to the cause. With France and Britain being the only highly-developed socialist countries in the world, it became widely accepted that they should launch a long-run help programme for other countries. Thus began the so-called 'Phalanstere Internationale', aimed at providing industrial support for socialist countries all over the world.
We shall apply
It is not neccessary
Brazilian participation in the Phalanstere Internationale

Our Brazilian comrades have applied to join the Phalanstere Internationale. With socialism in Brazil facing reactionaries in La Plata and Chile, it is only proper to help our comrades in their struggle. However, we will have to sacrifice a part of our overall industrial power in order to satisfy their needs.
Fine then, begin fulfilling their request

The Second International Congress

With the Second American Civil War raging on, as well as a number of other conflicts ready to break out at any time across the world, the Internationale has to redefine its approach towards the global revolution. Since the first Congress of the Internationale took place in France, many activists believe it would be the best to make Britain the second host.
It would be an honour to host the Congress
column9: Для нас будет честью провести конгресс

Inauguration of the Second International Congress

With all the delegates in London, the Second Congress of the Internationale begun with a speech by comrade Eric Blair. In his so-called 'Shield-and-Sword speech' he underlined the need for the Internationale to double its efforts towards forgeing the 'Damocles' - a weapon capable of destroying the reactionaries across the world once and for all.
Bravo, comrade Blair!
Day 2 - the American question

On the second day the delegates discussed the most pressing matter - the development of the Civil War in America. With Long and the Federal government pushing the CSA into the defensive, the decision was made to send additional help for Reed and his followers.
Provide resources, industrial machines, and weapons
Provide weapons
Provide industrial machines and resources
We cannot spare anything more

Day 2 - the American question

On the second day the delegates discussed the most pressing matter - the development of the Civil War in America. With Long and the Federal government pushing the CSA into the defensive, the decision was made to send additional help for Reed and his followers. Although Mexico is greatly weaker military and industry-wise, an intervention is an excellent way to show Latin devotion to the ideals of the Internationale.
Provide resources and volunteers
Provide resources
Provide volunteers
We cannot spare anything
Day 2 - the American question

On the second day the delegates discussed the most pressing matter - the development of the Civil War in America. With Long and the Federal government pushing the CSA into the defensive, the decision was made to send additional help for Reed and his followers. Without strong industry, Centroamerican intervention is likely to be little more than a gesture - but still an important one, as it will prove the devotion of the American branch of the Internationale.
Provide all the aid we can spare
Provide volunteers only
We cannot spare anything
British help arrives
Our British comrades have agreed to send us additional help. Transported from Mexico under constant USA and AUS air threat, it has recently arrived at our airbases and is ready to be put into use.
column9: Наши британские товарищи согласились послать нам дополнительную помощь. Транспортируемая из Мексики под постоянной воздушной угрозой США и Американского Союза, она недавно прибыла на наши авиабазы.

Day 3 - Hemingway's speech

With the American question settled, Ernest Hemingway, the Syndicates' delegate to the Congress, took the stage. He thanked all those who supported the CSA's cause and called on the Socialist world to constantly battle the reactionaries. The speech was received with great applause, especially by the French delegation.
Yes we can!
Day 3 - Hemingway's speech

Oui, nous pouvons!

Day 3 - Hemingway's speech

The Syndicalist delegate to the Second International Congress, Ernest Hemingway, has today given a speech, condemning our actions against the CSA and calling for intensified support for the Reds in this war. We must redouble our efforts and crush Reed before he receives any additional help.
Onwards!
Syndicalist intervention in civil war

Onwards!
Day 5 - Cambrigde conference

Along with the politicians in London, a separate meeting of scientists from France and Britain took place in the old university in Cambridge. It was decided that the Syndicalist countries should combine their research in order to develop a weapon capable of protecting the Revolution from the increasingly aggresive imperialist threat.
Knowledge is power

It was decided that the Syndicalist countries should combine their research in order to develop a weapon capable of protecting the Revolution from the increasingly aggresive imperialist threat.
Knowledge is power
Day 6 - South American socialists' call for help

With a socialist regime established in Brazil, tensions between Rio de Janeiro and Buenos Aires started to rise once again. It seems that the best way to protect the new goverment is to ask for international support via the Second International Congress.
column9: После установления социалистического режима в Бразилии, снова возникли трения между Рио-де-Жанейро и Буэнос-Айресом. Похоже, чтобы защитить новое правительство, будет лучшим выходом просить международной поддержки на Втором конгрессе.

column2: The final act of the Second International Congress

With all important decisions made during the first week, the Congress moved to less pressing matters. After 10 days of negotiations, discussion, and politicking, the delegates came up with the final act - a declaration of eternal brotherhood and readiness to face the imperialists, whereever they are to be found.
Workers of the world, unite!

Centroamerica annouces her ambitions
With the Socialist forces rising all over the world, it is about time for the Centroamerican Republic to declare her goals for the upcoming years.
column9: С ростом социалистических сил по всему миру, пришло время для Центроамериканской республики определить свои цели на предстоящие годы.

column2: We shall unite Latin America up to the Canal!
column9: Мы объединим Центральную Америку вплоть до Канала!

column2: We are content as we are for now
Centroamerica annouces her ambitions
Centroamerican delegate has just annouced his country's plan for expansion towards the Panama Canal. Should it fall into our hands, the Socialists' position in the world would greatly improve.
column9: Делегат Центроамерики объявил о планах экспансии своей страны пдо Панамского канала. Если он перейдет в их руки, позиции социалистов всего мира значительно укрепятся.

column2: Good luck, comrades!
Brazil - Bolivia alliance

With the Second International Congress in London underway, the governments of Brazil and Bolivia have started talks about soldifying Socialist influence in South America and forming a counterbalance for La Plata and Chile.
column9: Во время Второго конгресса Интернационала правительства Бразилии и Боливии начали переговоры об укреплдении социалистического влияния в Южной Америке и создании противовеса Ла-Плате и Чили.

It is not required
The treaty of La Paz
With common interests confirmed, a time has come to sign a treaty.
column9: После подтверждения взаимного согласия, пришло время подписать соглашение.

column2: Good luck, comrades!
Philip Snowden's death

Philip Snowden, aged 73, passed away in his house in Tilford, Surrey. Although he resigned from the Chairman's post almost a year ago, his authority and influence in the Union were unprecedented. During his funeral, the Chairman of the CTU stated that 'Comrade Snowden has left us - but his ideas shall live on, forever.' The ceremony turned out to be one of the greatest patriotic manifestations since the revolution of 1925.
Sic transit gloria mundi...
Philip Snowden's death

Philip Snowden, aged 73, passed away in his house in Tilford, Surrey. The traitor and the Chairman of the Union of Britain's CTU, Snowden has been remembered among the Royalists as a synonym for treachery and untrustworthiness. Although the Socialists in Britain mourn his death, in Canada his funeral became a single bright day in this dark period of history.
The devil is dead
German reaction to the Second Congress of the Internationale
column9: Немецкая реакция на Второй конгресс Интернационала

column2: The Congress has been received with anxiety in Germany. With the economic crisis still not completely solved, every increase in Socialist activity is a threat to Mitteleuropa and the German Empire. In his latest speech, the Kaiser has condemned the Socialists, but words are not enough - action should be taken as well.
Cover our back - propose a reinsurance treaty to Russia
column9: Нужно прикрыть спину, предложите соглашение России

column2: Approach our neighbours
Round up some left-wing agitators to calm the people down
column9: Схватите нескольких агитаторов левых, чтобы успокоить людей

column2: Germany proposes a reinsurance treaty

With the socialist revival in the West evident, the Kaiser decided to propose us a reinsurance treaty. According to the document, we would be obliged to aid the Kaiser, should Germany be attacked by France. This is an excellent chance to break our international isolation, as well as secure our Western flank until our army is rebuilt.
We accept
We refuse
The Kaiser promises protection

The Kaiser has promised to help our country, should the Internationale attempt to topple our government. This is a very good step in establishing a counterbalance for an increasingly-hostile international Socialism.
column9: Кайзер пообещал оказать помощь, если Интернационал попытается свергнуть наше правительство. Это важный шаг в создании противовеса все более враждебному международному социализму.

column2: Sehr gut
The Kaiser promises protection

The Kaiser has promised to help our country, should the Internationale attempt to topple our government. This is a very good step in establishing a counterbalance for an increasingly-hostile international Socialism.
column9: Кайзер пообещал оказать помощь, если Интернационал попытается свергнуть наше правительство. Это важный шаг в создании противовеса все более враждебному международному социализму.

column2: Sehr gut
The reinsurance treaty is signed
The Russians have accepted our proposition. In case of a war with France, they are obliged to come to our help, and so are we in an analogical situation.
column9: Русские приняли наше предложение. В случае войны с Францией они обязались прийти нам на помощь, так же как и мы, окажись они в аналогичной ситуации.

column2: Sehr gut
The reinsurance treaty is refused
The Russians have rejcted our proposition. Although their army is weak and it is unlikely a war will break out between our states, we still have our back exposed in case of a war with France.
column9: Русские отклонили наше предложение. Хотя их армия слаба, и маловероятно, что война вспыхнет между нашими государствами, наша спина все еще не прикрыта в случае войны с Францией.

column2: Scheisse!

column2: Excellent
The Kaiser promises protection

The Kaiser has promised to help our country, should the Internationale attempt to topple our government. This is a very good step in establishing a counterbalance for the increasingly-hostile international socialism.
column9: Кайзер обещает свою помощь, если Интернационал попытается свергнуть наше правительство. Это нужный шаг в создании противовеса для все более и более враждебного международного социализма.

column2: Splendid
Germany arrests left-wing activists

The Kaiser has initiated yet another campaign to purge Germany of left-wing sympathisers. Although this is a clear sign of panic from his side, the Internationale will surely suffer from the loss of such brave men.
column9: Кайзер начал еще одну кампанию по очистке Германии от сочувствующих левым. Хотя это явный признак паники с его стороны, Интернационалу будет не хватать этих храбрых людей.

column2: We shall not forget this...
