Propose joint project to Commune !
We wont waste money on such absurdity !
The Damocles Project ?
Establish the Damocles Project !
We wont waste money on such absurdity !
Establishment of the Damocles project
Government of the French Commune has accepted our offer regarding creation of the joint Damocles project. This grand undertaking will allow us to spread syndicalism to the entire world !
Excellent !
A new threat ?
Listen to Einstein and counter this new threat !
Our generals are right, this is just science-fiction !
Fourth Congress of the Greater Italian Union
Today, the Fourth Congress of the Greater Italian Union begins. In the following days economic, internal, and military policies will be discussed and decisions will be made.
column9: Сегодня открывается Четвертый съезд Большого итальянского совета. В следующие дни будут определены экономическая, внешняя и военная политики.

column2: Let's get to work!
Fourth Congress of the Greater Italian Union - Economic Policy
column9: Четвертый съезд Большого итальянского совета - экономическая политика

column2: The first topic is economic policy. The Social-Reformist Union proposes the expansion of both industry and agriculture whereas the Anarco-Syndicalists and the National-Syndicalists endorse policies focused only on industrialization.
column9: Первый вопрос - экономическая политика. Социал-реформисты предлагают расширять промышленность и сельское хозяйство, тогда как анархо-синдикалисты и национал-синдикалисты требуют сосредоточится исключительно на промышленности.

column2: Social-Reformist: we should expand both industry and agriculture
column9: Социал-реформисты, мы должны расширить промышленность и сельское хозяйство

column2: Anarco-Syndicalist: we should focus on industry
column9: Анархо-синдикалисты, мы должны сосредоточиться на промышленности

column2: National-Syndicalist: heavy industrialization is required!
Fourth Congress of the Greater Italian Union - Internal Policy
column9: Четвертый съезд Большого итальянского совета - внутренняя политика

column2: While discussing internal security, the Mafia problem emerged as the main issue. While the Social-Reformists want to increase the social spending to help the population in the area affected by this problem, the Anarco-Syndicalists want to increase the funding of the police, the Republican Guard, to fight the criminals, and the National-Syndicalists are ready to use every weapon in their hands to eradicate the disease.
Social-Reformist: increase social spending and support to the people!
Anarco-Syndicalist: increase the funding of the Republican Guard!
column9: Анархо-синдикалисты, увеличить расходы на Республиканскую гвардию!

column2: National-Syndicalist: the Mafia must be destroyed by every means possible!
Fourth Congress of the Greater Italian Union - Military Policy
column9: Четвертый съезд Большого итальянского совета - военная политика

column2: Regarding Military affairs, the Social-Reformists propose a small, well-trained army for self-defence, the Anarco-Syndicalists propose a large, popular army, and the National-Syndicalists propose an aggressive demographic policy to increase the population and therefore future manpower.
Social-Reformist: a professional army, for self-defence!
Anarco-Syndicalist: a popular army, for the people!
National-Syndicalist: demographic policies for the future!
The Social-Reformists achieved a majority!
The Social-Reformists achieved a clear majority: they will now form a new government!
column9: Социал-реформисты получили абсолютное большинство и формируют новое правительство.

column2: Social-Reformists are now in charge of the government! Urrah!
The Anarco-Syndicalists achieved a majority!
The Anarco-Syndicalists achieved a clear majority: they will now form a new government!
column9: Анархо-синдикалисты получили абсолютное большинство и формируют новое правительство.

column2: Anarco-Syndicalists are now in charge of the government! Urrah!
The National-Syndicalists achieved a majority!
The National-Syndicalists achieved a clear majority: they will now form a new government!
column9: Национал-синдикалисты получили абсолютное большинство и формируют новое правительство.

column2: National-Syndicalists are now in charge of the government! Urrah!
Fourth Congress of the Greater Italian Union - Draw
column9: Четвертый съезд Большого итальянского совета - ничья

column2: Nobody could achieve a clear majority, the people are not happy, who will lead the country now?
column9: Никто не смог набрать большинство, кто возглавит страну теперь?

column2: Damn it!
The Italians cannot decide.

During the Congress of the Greater Italian Union, none of the three branches (the Social-Reformist Union, the Anarco-Syndicalist Union, and the National-Syndicalist Union) achieved a clear majority. Maybe we can help them choose the new government?
column9: Во время съезда Большого итальянского совета никто не набрал большинства. Возможно нам стоит помочь выбрать им новое правительство?

column2: Support the Social-Reformists!
Support the Anarco-Syndicalists!
Support the National-Syndicalists!
It's not our problem

Support the Anarco-Syndicalists!
Support the National-Syndicalists!

The French support the Social-Reformists
The French are supporting the Social-Reformists. Should we listen to their advice or should we try to find a solution on our own?
column9: Французы поддержали социал-реформистов. Прислушаться ли к их мнению или попытаться найти решение самостоятельно?

column2: Social-Reformists are now in charge of the government! Urrah!
We don't care what the French think!
The French support the Anarco-Syndicalists
The French are supporting the Anarco-Syndicalists. Should we listen to their advice or should we try to find a solution on our own?
column9: Французы поддержали анархо-синдикалистов. Прислушаться ли к их мнению или попытаться найти решение самостоятельно?

column2: Anarco-Syndicalists are now in charge of the government! Urrah!
We don't care what the French think!
The French support the National-Syndicalists

column2: National-Syndicalists are now in charge of the government! Urrah!
We don't care what the French think!
An agreement

The Social-Reformists and the Anarco-Syndicalists achieved an agreement and will now lead a new government. Togliatti will remain the President of the Republic but Luigi Longo, from the Social-Reformist Union, will be the new Chairman of the House of Commons!
A new government!
The death of Michele Bianchi

Michele Bianchi, a prominent figure of Italian Syndicalism and the current Chairman of the House of Commons, suffered a stroke and died today. The country mourns the loss of a man who always fought for the great cause of Syndicalism. However, a new Chairman must be chosen: will it be the faithful Luigi Federzoni or the power hungry Benito Mussolini?
Luigi Federzoni is the right man for the job.
Benito Mussolini can lead the country on his own!
The death of Michele Bianchi

Michele Bianchi, a prominent figure of Italian Syndicalism and member of the National-Syndicalist union, suffered a heart stroke and died today. The country mourns the loss of a man who always fought for the great cause of Syndicalism.
column9: Микеле Бьянки, выдающаяся фигура итальянского синдикализма и член Национал-синдикалистского союза, сегодня перенес сердечный удар и умер. Страна оплакивает утрату человека, который всегда боролся за великую идею синдикализма.

column2: A great loss.
The misterious disappearance of Ettore Majorana

Ettore Majorana was a brilliant scientist and a true genius according to many (Enrico Fermi among them). However, he disappeared on March 27, 1938 under mysterious circumstances during a return boat trip from Palermo to Naples. Despite several investigations, the truth about his fate is still uncertain.
What could have happened?
The capital of the Socialist Republic of Italy
Now that Rome is under our control, we have the opportunity to move there. Should Rome be the new capital of the Socialist Republic of Italy or should we stay in Naples?
column9: Теперь, когда Рим находится под нашим контролем, мы можем перенести столицу туда.

column2: Roma is once again the capital!
Napoli should remain the capital
Reclaiming Venice
Now that the Second Italian Unification has started, only the return of Venice to its rightful owners can complete it.
column9: С началом второго итальянского объединения пришло время вернуть Венецию законному владельцу.

column2: Venice is rightfully ours!
Venice and Trento are rightfully ours!
column9: Венеция и Тренто по праву наши!

column2: Venice, Trento, and Pola are rightfully ours!
column9: Венеция, Тренто и Пола по праву наши!

column2: We should not raise the tension
Venice is under our control!
Our armed forces have taken control of Venice, our proud nation was forced to secede it to Austria-Hungary after our disastrous defeat in the Weltkrieg!
column9: Венеция снова находится под нашим контролем, люди счастливы!

column2: Great!
Trento is under our control!
Our armed forces have taken control of the Trento region inhabited by a large Italian population, who gladly welcome their liberators from Austrian tyranny!
column9: Тренто снова находится под нашим контролем, народ приветствует нас как освободителей от австрийской тирании!

column2: Great!
Malta is under our control!
Our armed forces have taken control of the isle of Malta: inhabited by a large Italian population, the locals gladly welcome their liberators from German tyranny!
Great!
Pola is under our control!
Our armed forces have taken control of Istria: inhabited by a large Italian population, the locals gladly welcome their liberators from Austrian tyranny!
Great!
The mafia problem

One of the most pressing matters which will be discussed on April in the Fourth Congress of the Greater Italian Union is how to deal with the Mafia. Despite the efforts of the government, this problems has started to affect the economy of the Republic, with increasing negative effets.
We must do something about this!
column9: Мы должны что-то сделать с этим!

column2: Mafia is not a problem anymore

After years of struggle, finally the Mafia has been eradicated from the territory of the Republic. Thanks to our help and support the poor people understood that the State is their friend and that the Mafia is their problem too. The influence of the Mafia in society has finally disappeared.
We took good care of the people!
Mafia is not a problem anymore
After years of struggle, finally the Mafia has been eradicated from the territory of the Republic. The Republican Guards have stopped those criminals, now the Republic can grow even stronger!
column9: После долгих лет борьбы мафия наконец-то была уничтожена на территории республики. Республиканская гвардия остановила этих преступников, теперь республика станет сильнее!

column2: The police did a great job!
Mafia is not a problem anymore

After years of struggle, finally the Mafia has been eradicated from the territory of the Republic. However, the fight was fierce and the infrastructure in Sicily suffered because of that. The people are not as happy as they should be because they didn't like the way we handled the problem.
We had to pay the price
Mafia escalation
The power of the Mafia is increasing, these criminals are getting out of control!
column9: Могущество мафии растет, эти преступники выходят из-под контроля!

column2: It's a big problem
Mafia escalation in the United States
column9: Обострение конфликта с мафией в США

column2: The power of the Mafia in the United States is increasing, those criminals are getting out of control. This could be very dangerous, as they could help their friends here in the Republic. To avoid such a situation we could end our commercial trade with the United States, because they can be used to give funds to the local mafiosi.
Cut the trades, isolation from the USA!
They can't harm us.
Mafia men leaving for the American Union State
We found out that many persons, who we think are members of the local Mafia, decided to leave our country to join the American Civil War, probably on the side of the American Union State.
column9: Мы выяснили, что члены местных мафиозных групп стремятся покинть страну, чтобы принять участие в американской гражданской войне на стороне Американского Союза.

column2: Well, who cares?
Italian mafia volunteers

column9: Итальянские мафиози прибыли волонтерами в нашу страну. Стоит ли позволить им присоединиться к нашей армии?

column2: We need all the help we can get!
No deals with the Mafia!
More mafia men leaving for the American Union State
column9: Все больше мафиози уезжает в Американский Союз

column2: We found out that criminals will try to leave our country and join the American Civil War on the side of the American Union State. What should we do? If those criminals leave our country to die in America, it could be good for us.
column9: Мы выяснили, что члены местных мафиозных групп по прежнему стремятся покинть страну, чтобы принять участие в американской гражданской войне на стороне Американского Союза. Будет только лучше, если они уедут и умрут в Америке.

The death of Antonio Gramsci

Antonio Gramsci, leader of the Anarco-Syndicalist Union and current Chairman of the House of Commons, died today after a sudden intracranial hemorrhage. Since childhood he suffered from a malformation of the spine caused by Pott's disease which left him hunch-backed and underdeveloped. The Anarco-Syndicalist Union decided that Amedeo Bordiga will be the new Chairman of the House of Commons
column3: at the same time Ruggiero Greco will be the new General Responsible of the Police.

Revolution

The internal dissent has grown too far, the people are revolting against our governemnt, asking for democracy and free elections! What should we do? Should we suffocate the revolution with their blood or should we listen to their demands?
column9: Внутренние проблемы нарастают, народ восстал против нашего правительства, требуя свободных выборов! Что мы должны сделать? Мы можем утопить революцию в крови, или стоит выслушать их требования?

column2: The government maintains control!
Introduce democracy and free elections!
Democratic Elections

Since we now are a democratic country, it is time for free elections! There are four parties struggling for votes: the Christian Democracy (Democrazia Cristiana) party led by Scelba and Alessi, the Liberal Party (Partito Liberale) lead by De Nicola and Giannini, the right-wing militarist National Movement (Movimento Nazionale) led by Farinacci and Starace, and the social-democratic Labour Party (Partito del Lavoro) led by Turati and Salvemini (born from the ashes of the Social-Reformist Union).
The Christian Democracy (Social-Conservative)!
The Liberal Party (Social-Liberals)!
The National Movement (Authoritarian Democrat)!
The Labour Party (Social-Democract)!

The issue of the fortifications in Central Italy

Now that the Italian peninsula is once again a united country, we do not need fortresses in the middle of our united country. The question is, what should we do with them? We can destroy them and recover the materials, convert them to improve the local infrastructure, or keep them as a memorial of war.
Destroy them and recover the materials
Destroy them and use the material to improve our country!
Keep them and never forget!
The Second Risorgimento

With German hegemony in Europe crumbling and the ascendancy of the Syndicalist movement on the continent, we're now in a brilliant position to crush the bourgeoisie ruling the northern part of the Italian peninsular!
The revolution shall march all the way to the Alps!
No, we are still not ready for this
The death of J. S. Woodsworth

James Shaver Woodsworth, a prominent figure in Canadian Syndicalism and the current President, suffered a stroke and died today. The country mourns the loss of a man who always fought for the great cause of Syndicalism. However, a new President must be chosen: will it be the faithful Stanley Knowles or the more radical Arthur Evans?
Stanley Knowles is the right man for the job.

column2: He was a good man.
The first Congress of the Canadian Trade Unions

Today the first Congress of the Canadian Trade Unions begins. Although political parties are banned, there are informal groups gathering trade unionists with common ideologies: liberal Reformists, orthodox Labourists, and strict Totalists.
column9: Сегодня начался первый съезд Канадского конгресса профсоюзов. Поскольку политические партии были запрещены, члены профсоюзов объединились в неформальные группы, представляющие конкретные идеологии.

column2: The CTUC Congress begins! How exciting!
CTUC Congress - Division of the economy

On this day of the CTUC congress, the debate has wandered into the area of economics. As has been predicted, every faction has put forward their own suggestions. Most people assume that the Labourists will win this debate, since Arthur Evans is a major figure in the Canadian economy these days.
The economy should be controlled by local cooperative sections (Ref)
Trade unions will control the economy (Lab)
Central planning is the key to success (Tot)
CTUC Congress - Economic development
Today the Congress still debates over the economy. This time the main issue is about the development of the country. Each faction has their own development plan, so it's hard to say who will win.
column9: Сегодня на съезде обсуждают развитие экономики. Каждая фракция вносит свои предложения и планы, поэтому трудно сказать, кто победит

column2: We must expand agriculture (Ref)
Industry, for Canada and trade unions! (Lab)
The northern parts of our country need development (Tot)
CTUC Congress - Military Affairs

The debate has wandered into the area of military affairs. As has been predicted, every faction has put forward their own suggestions. The debate is heated, since the last few days have only too clearly shown the deep rift within the TUC.
column9: Развернулись дебаты по военным вопросам. Как и ожидалось, каждая фракция выдвинула свои собственные предложения. Дебаты накаляются, показывая, насколько глубока пропасть между различными фракциями ККПС

column2: Let us build socialism at home (Ref)
Workers' militia as an army of workers (Lab)
Expand the army of the proletariat! (Tot)
Tanks are the future! (All)
CTUC Congress - Foreign Policy

On this day of the CTUC congress, the debate has wandered into the area of foreign policy. As has been predicted, every faction has put forward their own suggestions. The Congress listened casually to every candidate until the suggestion of the Reformists was heard, when a slow, shocked murmur ran through the hall.
Isolationism - Canada is a world in itself! (Ref)
Build socialism with the Internationale (Lab)
We must directly fight against the capitalists! (Tot)
Quebec issue
Our country owns Quebec. The main problem is - which policy should be chosen? Both Reformists and Labourists suggest accepting the French culture, while Totalists want assimilation.
column9: Необходимо определиться с нашей политикой по поводу Квебека. Какую политику мы предпочтем? Реформисты и лейбористы выступают за принятие французской культуры, в то время, как тоталисты - за ассимиляцию

column2: Establish the primacy of the French in the Province (Ref)
Promote Quebecois culture (Lab)
Begin to intergrate them (Tot)
Canadian Election - Totalists secure a majority
column9: Тоталисты получают большинство на выборах в Канаде

column2: The CTUC has decided to vote for Tim Buck's Totalists with an overwhelming majority. Tim Buck will become the new Chairman of the CTUC.
column9: Тоталисты получили подавляющее большинство на выборах. Тим Бак - новый председатель ККПС

column2: Congratulations, Comrade Buck
Canadian Election - Labourists secure a majority
column9: Лейбористы получают большинство на выборах в Канаде

column2: The CTUC has decided to vote for Arthur Evans' Labourists with an overwhelming majority. Albert Goodwin will become the new Chairman of the CTUC.
column9: Лейбористы Артура Эванса победили на выборах. Альберт Гудвин - новый председатель ККПС

column2: Congratulations, Comrade Evans
Canadian Election - Reformists secure a majority
column9: Реформисты получают большинство на выборах в Канаде

column2: The CTUC has decided to vote for Woodsworth's Reformists with an overwhelming majority. Abraham Heaps will become the new Chairman of the CTUC.
column9: Реформисты Вудсворта победили на выборах. Абрахам Хипс - новый председатель ККПС

column2: Congratulations, Comrade Woodsworth
Canadian Election - Reformists secure a majority
column9: Реформисты получают большинство на выборах в Канаде

column2: The CTUC has decided to vote for Knowles' Reformists with an overwhelming majority. Abraham Heaps will become the new Chairman of the CTUC.
column9: Реформисты Ноулза победили на выборах. Абрахам Хипс - новый председатель ККПС

column2: Congratulations, Comrade Knowles
Canadian Election - Draw
The CTUC has voted repeatedly during the last few days, and the deadlock continues. What should be done?
column9: ККПС проголосовал уже несколько раз на протяжении последних дней, но никому не удается получить большинство. Как мы поступим?

column2: Let's make a coalition between Labourists and Reformists
Third Congress - announcement

We have been preparing for The Third International since 1937. Now, we are nearly ready to hold the Third Congress right here in the Palace Populaire (former Louvre) in Paris. For three days, the city will host delegates from almost every Socialist and Syndicalist party from all across the world. We, the French, will take the floor first, that is if we are still planning on hosting the Third Congress and continuing the work of the Second International.
The Congress will be held a week after May Day as planned!
column9: Конгресс пройдет через неделю после Первого мая, как и запланировано!

column2: We don't need another Congress
The Internationale is useless now!
The Third Congress of the Third International
It is time to invite the Socialist and Syndicalist leaders who will be coming from all around the Globe to attend the Third Congress of the Third International.
column9: Пришло время пригласить социалистических и синдикалистских лидеров всего мира на Третий съезд Третьего интернационала

column2: Send out the invitations!
The Third International
France has gone through with its designs to hold the Third Congress of the Third International and we, as expected, have received an invitation. It would be foolish not to send a delegation.
column9: Франция закончила подготовку к проведению Третьего интернационала и мы, как и ожидалось, получили приглашение. Отклонить его будет глупо.

column2: Dave Kirkwood will represent the Union of Britain
column9: Дэйв Кирквуд будет представлять Британский Союз

Our only priority is Socialism in Britain and nowhere else

column9: Без нас он не будет Третьим Интернационалом!

column9: В России все так не постоянно...

column2: We owe it to France to come.
Things are too unstable here in Spain...
All of the Delegates have arrived

Leaders of Socialist and Syndicalist countries and parties, Foreign Ministers, and journalists have all arrived in Paris for the opening of the Third Congress of the Third International. It is time to open the doors and take the stage.
column9: Лидеры социалистических и синдикалистских стран и партий, министры иностранных дел, представители прессы, все прибыли в Париж на Третий съезд Третьего интернационала.

column2: The Third Congress of the Third International is hereby opened!
column9: Третий съезд начнется в ближайшее время!

column2: The Chairman of the Comitй de Salut Public takes the floor
column9: Глава Комитета общественного спасения берет слово

column2: Now that everyone is assembeled and the Congress has begun, it is time to take the stage on open discussion. The Prime Minister took the stage first and discussed the purpose of the Third International. After the purpose of the Third International is made more clear, the discussion will begin.
Our efforts in spreading the worldwide revolution are valuable, keep it up!
column9: Наши усилия по распространению Мировой революции приносят плоды. Так держать!

column2: We are tired of spreading words of revolution...
Syndicalism in Europe
Europe still suffers from the hands of the international reactionaries. The German Empire, the evil Habsburg tyranny, Russia... all of them have punished the European proletariat.
column9: Европа все еще страдает под гнетом реакционеров. Германская империя, злобные Габсбурги, Россия... все они угнетают пролетариат.

column2: The French will liberate Europe and ask all other members to do the same!
column9: Французы приложат все усилия для освобождения Европы и просят остальные страны о том же!

column2: If they stay neutral to us, there's no need for drastic action
column9: Нет нужды в радикальных решениях, пока они остаются нейтральными

column2: Syndicalism in Europe
Europe still suffers from the hands of the international reactionaries. The German Empire, the evil Habsburg tyranny, Russia... all of them have punished the European proletariat.
column9: Европа все еще страдает под гнетом реакционеров. Германская империя, злобные Габсбурги, Россия... все они угнетают пролетариат.

column2: Britain will do what it can to help the European workers!
column9: Британия пойдет на в все, чтобы помочь трудящимся Европы!

column2: The French will do it
African Syndicalism

The South African Republic is the only African state industrialised enough to establish a organised Syndicalist state. The rest of continent is poor and occupied by colonialists. However, Syndicalism there should prevail no matter the costs.
column9: ЮАР - единственная страна в Африке, достаточно промышленно развитая, чтобы стать синдикалистской. Остальная часть континента бедна и оккупирована колонизаторами. Тем не менее, синдикализм должен победить и здесь, не взирая на цену.

column2: We must liberate the African peoples!
It makes no difference to us
African Syndicalism

The South African Republic is the only African state industrialised enough to establish a organised Syndicalist state. The rest of continent is poor and occupied by colonialists. However, Syndicalism there should prevail no matter the costs.
column9: ЮАР - единственная страна в Африке, достаточно промышленно развитая, чтобы стать синдикалистской. Остальная часть континента бедна и оккупирована колонизаторами. Тем не менее, синдикализм должен победить и здесь, не взирая на цену.

column2: Union of Britain will bring freedom and justice to Africa!
column9: Британский Союз принесет Африке свободу и справедливость!

column2: ... but first we have to secure ourselves
Situation in America
Unfortunately, the Combined Syndicates of America have failed in preparing the Revolution on the American continent. Reactionaries have once again taken control of North America.
column9: К сожалению, Объединенные Синдикаты Америки не сумели организовать революцию на американском континенте. Реакционеры вновь контролируют Северную Америку.

column2: Pledge our support for the American Workers
There's no chance for a Third American Revolution
column9: Третья американская революция не имеет шансов

column2: Situation in America
Unfortunately, the Combined Syndicates of America have failed in preparing the Revolution on the American continent. Reactionaries have once again taken control of North America.
column9: К сожалению, Объединенные Синдикаты Америки не сумели организовать революцию на американском континенте. Реакционеры вновь контролируют Северную Америку.

column2: American capitalists shall perish!
There is no chance for another Revolution in America, spare no aid
column9: Нет никаких шансов на революцию в Америке, не посылать помощь

column2: Economic situation of the Socialist states
Our economy is shattered and ravaged by neverending war preparations and the war itself. However, there is an even worse situation in the new Syndicalist countries, especially agrarian ones.
column9: Наша экономика разорена бесконечными военными приготовлениями и самой войной. Однако, в новых синдикалистских странах, особенно аграрных, ситуация еще хуже.

column2: Spare funds to help the suffering proletariat!
We have more important issues
Economical situation of the Socialist states
Our economy is shattered and ravaged by neverending war preparations and the war itself. However, there is an even worse situation in the new Syndicalist countries, especially agrarian ones.
column9: Наша экономика разорена бесконечными военными приготовлениями и самой войной. Однако, в новых синдикалистских странах, особенно аграрных, ситуация еще хуже.

column2: Spare funds to help the suffering proletariat!
We have more important issues
Totalism: a way to forward?

Totalitarian socialism, commonly known as Totalism, offers total state control over the economy and the media. Some radical groups, forming the infamous 'Totalitarian Internationale', still belive that Totalism can bring Socialism faster than Syndicalism. However, to the average Joe and more orthodox leftists, Totalism is an abomination that has nothing in common with Socialism, freedom, prosperity etc.
Perhaps Totalism isn't the best way to Socialism...
Totalism is the future of Socialism!

Totalism is the future of Socialism!
Decolonization in Asia
The Foreign Minister of the Bhiartiya Commune appeared before the Third Syndicalist Congress, making the case of supporting both independence and Syndicalist movements in Asia.
column9: В выступлении перед съездом Интернационала министр иностранных дел Бхартийской Коммуны поднял вопрос о поддержке национально-освободительных и синдикалистских движений в Азии.

column2: Ask for support from the International in liberating oppressed Asia
column9: Просить у членов Интернационала помощи для угнетенных народов Азии

column2: There are more important issues at hand

column2: Through independence into Socialism!

column2: Future of Syndicalism

The future of Syndicalism doesn't look as bright as optimists would predict. Our glorious labour movement is in danger mostly because of internal threats: secessionist movements, quasi-anarchist 'liberation' factions, the 'Totalist Internationale,' tensions between Syndicalist states and so on. We have to secure the achievements of the past 20 years of growing Syndicalism for future generations.
The future of the proletariat will be secured!
Future of Syndicalism

The future of Syndicalism doesn't look as bright as optimists would predict. Our glorious labour movement is in danger mostly because of internal threats: secessionist movements, quasi-anarchist 'liberation' factions, the 'Totalist Internationale,' tensions between Syndicalist states and so on. We have to secure the achievements of the past 20 years of growing Syndicalism for future generations.
The future of the proletariat will be secured!
The end of the Third Congress
The Third Congress of the Third International has come to a close and the agenda has been met.
column9: Третий съезд Третьего Интернационала подошел к концу

We will take the floor first, that is if we are still planning on hosting the Third Congress and contiuning the work of the Second International.
The Congress will be held a week after May Day as planned!

All of the Delegates have arrived

Leaders of Socialist and Syndicalist countries and parties, Foreign Ministers, and journalists have all arrived in Chicago for the opening of the Third Congress of the Third International. It is time to open the doors and take the stage.
column9: Лидеры социалистических и синдикалистских стран и партий, министры иностранных дел, представители прессы, все прибыли в Чикаго на третий съезд Третьего интернационала.

column2: The Third Congress of the Third International is hereby opened!
column9: Третий съезд начнется в ближайшее время!

column2: The Chairman of the General Comittee takes the floor

Now that everyone is assembeled and the Congress has begun, it is time to take the stage on open discussion. The Premier took the stage first and discussed the purpose of the Third International. After the purpose of the Third International is made more clear, the discussion will begin.
Our efforts in spreading the worldwide revolution are invaluable, keep it up!
We are tired of spreading words of revolution...
Syndicalism in Europe
Europe still suffers from the hands of the international reactionaries. The German Empire, the evil Habsburg tyranny, Russia... all of them have punished the European proletariat.
column9: Европа все еще страдает под гнетом реакционеров. Германская империя, злобные Габсбурги, Россия... все они угнетают пролетариат.

column2: America will liberate Europe and ask all other members to do the same!
column9: Американцы приложат все усилия для освобождения Европы и просят остальные страны о том же!

column2: If they stay neutral to us, there's no need for drastic action
column9: Нет нужды в радикальных решениях, пока они остаются нейтральными

column2: Fall of the Commune
Our efforts were insufficient and the Commune of France is no more. Now, we have to defend the last stronghold of Syndicalism, the Union of Britain.
column9: Наши усилия не увенчались успехом и Французская Коммуна была уничтожена. Теперь мы должны защитить последний оплот синдикализма, Британский Союз.

column2: The German oppressors shall perish!
There is no chance to liberate France...
column9: Нет никаких шансов на освобождение Франции...

column2: Fall of the Commune
Our efforts were insufficient and the Commune of France is no more. Now, we have to defend the last stronghold of Syndicalism, the Union of Britain.
column9: Наши усилия не увенчались успехом и Французская Коммуна была уничтожена. Теперь мы должны защитить последний оплот синдикализма, Британский Союз.

column2: The German oppressors shall perish!
There is no chance to liberate France...
column9: Нет никаких шансов на освобождение Франции...

column2: African Syndicalism

The South African Republic is the only African state industrialised enough to establish a organised Syndicalist state. The rest of continent is poor and occupied by colonialists. However, Syndicalism there should prevail no matter the costs.
column9: ЮАР - единственная страна в Африке, достаточно промышленно развитая, чтобы стать синдикалистской. Остальная часть континента бедна и оккупирована колонизаторами. Тем не менее, синдикализм должен победить и здесь, не взирая на цену.

column2: We must liberate African peoples!
It makes no difference to us
Economic situation of the Socialist states
Our economy is shattered and ravaged by neverending war preparations and war itself. However, an even worse situation is in new Syndicalist countries, especially agrarian ones.
column9: Наша экономика разорена бесконечными военными приготовлениями и самой войной. Однако, в новых синдикалистских странах, особенно аграрных, ситуация еще хуже.

column2: Spare funds to help the suffering proletariat!
We have more important issues
Totalism: a way to forward?

Totalitarian socialism, commonly known as Totalism, offers total state control over the economy and the media. Some radical groups, part of the infamous 'Totalitarian Internationale,' still belive that Totalism can bring Socialism faster than Syndicalism. However, for the average Joe and more orthodox leftists, Totalism is an abomination that has nothing in common with Socialism, freedom, prosperity etc.
Perhaps Totalism isn't the best way to Socialism...
Totalism is the future of Socialism!
Future of Syndicalism

The future of Syndicalism doesn't look as bright as optimists would predict. Our glorious labour movement is in danger mostly because of internal threats: secessionist movements, quasi-anarchist 'liberation' factions, the 'Totalist Internationale', tensions between Syndicalist states and so on. We have to secure the achievements of the past 20 years of growing Syndicalism for future generations.
The future of the proletariat will be secured!
The end of the Third Congress
The Third Congress of the Third International has come to a close and the agenda has been met.
column9: Третий съезд Третьего Интернационала подошел к концу

column2: Workers of the world, unite!
